Adventure.description: Framed for a robbery, a gunman hides out in the home of the local sheriff and gradually wins his trust and respect. Now they must face the vengeful townspeople in a bloody war.

Adventure.title: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot
Adventure.description: An American war hero who secretly assassinated Adolf Hitler has now been called upon to take out another global threat – Bigfoot.

Adventure.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
Adventure.description: Russell Crowe is a 19th-century British warship captain who leads a motley crew as they prepare to attack a superior French vessel.

Adventure.title: Maze
Adventure.description: Based on the incredible true story of the 1983 mass break-out of 38 IRA prisoners from the HMP Maze high security prison, one prisoner engineers the largest European prison escape since World War II.

Adventure.title: The Mechanic
Adventure.description: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller that co-stars Jan-Michael Vincent and Jill Ireland.

Adventure.title: Missing Link
Adventure.description: "Missing Link" is a globe-trotting comedy-adventure about a dashing investigator of myths and monsters (Hugh Jackman) and the surprisingly silly and soulful beast he discovers (Zach Galifianakis).

Adventure.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
Adventure.description: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster of epic proportions.

Adventure.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
Adventure.description: When the IMF is disavowed after being implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, Ethan Hunt and the remaining team must go underground and across the globe to clear the organization's name. Presented by FXM

Adventure.title: The Monkey King 3
Adventure.description: The Monkey King and his traveling companions must find a way to escape from the clutches of a queen who rules an all-female kingdom. They soon land in even deeper trouble when their shenanigans anger the mighty River God.

Adventure.title: Monos
Adventure.description: A young group of soldiers and rebels keep watch over an American hostage, Doctora. After an ambush drives the squadron into the jungle, both the mission and the intricate bonds between the group begin to disintegrate.

Adventure.title: Mortdecai
Adventure.description: Depp, Paltrow, and McGregor star in this globe-trotting comedy about an unlikely team recruited to find a stolen, priceless painting.

Adventure.title: My Little Pony: A Very Minty Christmas
Adventure.description: Clumsy Minty Pony (Tabitha St. Germain) breaks the holiday candy cane that guides Santa Claus to Ponyville every year; includes bonus episode "Dancing in the Clouds."

Adventure.title: My Little Pony: The Princess Promenade
Adventure.description: The ponies' annual Spring Promenade goes awry when a 1,000-year-old dragon awakens and fulfills a royal prophecy.

Adventure.title: My Little Pony: Twinkle Wish Adventure
Adventure.description: All the ponies cannot wait for the Winter Wishes festival where the Wishing Star grants each pony one special wish. But when the Wishing Star disappears, they go on a journey to find it. But will they make it back in time for the festival?

Adventure.title: Nate and Hayes
Adventure.description: A fast-paced action-adventure pirate tale set in the high seas of the South Pacific in the mid-1800s, involving a young minister and his resourceful bride with a dashing buccaneer who changes their lives forever.

Adventure.title: Naz & Maalik
Adventure.description: Two closeted teens from Bed-Stuy unwittingly find themselves in the crosshairs of the War on Terror when surveillance footage of their secretive behavior is wildly misinterpreted in this smart indie comedy.

Adventure.title: The Nightingale
Adventure.description: Director Jennifer Kent ("The Babadook") tells the sweeping tale of a young woman's quest for revenge set in 1825 against the perilous and unforgiving terrain of Tasmania.

Adventure.title: No Holds Barred
Adventure.description: When world wrestling champion Rip Thomas (Hulk Hogan) refuses to join a competing network, an evil executive creates a new program, "The Battle of the Tough Guys," where rules don't exist and men engage in an all-out brawl for money.

Adventure.title: Once Upon a Time in Venice
Adventure.description: When Steve Ford's (Bruce Willis) beloved dog, Buddy, is stolen by local thugs, he makes a questionable alliance with their devious leader, Spyder (Jason Momoa) in order to set things straight and get Buddy back where he belongs.

Adventure.title: One for the Money
Adventure.description: Stephanie Plum, unemployed and newly divorced, lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Adventure.title: The Osiris Child
Adventure.description: When a dangerous outbreak threatens to destroy everyone living on a newly colonized planet, Lt. Kane Sommerville goes against orders and leaves his station to rescue his young daughter before it's too late.

Adventure.title: Outbreak
Adventure.description: Doctors try to stop a deadly virus spreading through a California town.

Adventure.title: Overdrive
Adventure.description: Scott Eastwood stars in this action-adventure from the writers of 2 Fast 2 Furious and the director of Taken. When two legendary car thieves are caught stealing from a mafia boss, they are given a week to nab a vintage Ferrari, or risk losing everything.

Adventure.title: Overlord
Adventure.description: D-Day invasion finds two paratroopers caught behind enemy lines fighting Nazis and supernatural forces, resulting from a secret Nazi experiment.

Adventure.title: The Pagan King
Adventure.description: On his deathbed, the reigning king bestows power to an unexpected heir who must find strength within himself to unite his people against the violent crusades which threaten their freedom.

Adventure.title: Pan
Adventure.description: Hugh Jackman stars in this magical adaptation of 'Peter Pan' that finds Peter up against devious pirate Blackbeard.

Adventure.title: The Patriot
Adventure.description: A reluctant South Carolina farmer (Mel Gibson) is forced to fight the British in this epic adventure of the American Revolution. Directed by Roland Emmerich (Independence Day). Screenplay by Robert Rodat (Saving Private Ryan).

Adventure.title: PawParazzi
Adventure.description: The cushy life of Latte the Hollywood dog is turned upside down when her owner, superstar actress London Bridges, heads to the boonies to make a new film.

Adventure.title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
Adventure.description: Shia LaBeouf, Dakota Johnson, and Zack Gottsagen star in "a modern-day Mark Twain fable that will melt your heart" (Flickering Myth).

Adventure.title: Pilgrimage
Adventure.description: Leaving his Irish monastery for the first time, a young novice departs with a devoted group of monks and a mysterious former Crusader as they attempt to transport a holy relic to Rome.

Adventure.title: Pokémon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction
Adventure.description: Ash must help Diancie and stop Yveltal's rampage!

Adventure.title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
Adventure.description: Ash must help Hoopa overcome its own darkness!

Adventure.title: Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel
Adventure.description: The Soul-Heart Calls…

Adventure.title: Pony Express
Adventure.description: In 1860, Buffalo Bill Cody and Wild Bill Hickok are sent to establish a Pony Express service across California.

Adventure.title: Poseidon
Adventure.description: When a rogue wave capsizes a luxury cruise ship in the middle of the North Atlantic Ocean, a small group of survivors find themselves unlikely allies in a battle for their lives.

Adventure.title: Prospect
Adventure.description: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote moon on the hunt for elusive riches. But there are others roving the moon's toxic forest and the job quickly devolves into a desperate fight to escape.

Adventure.title: The Quake
Adventure.description: From the people that brought you the hit thriller The Wave, this action spectacular forewarns a new catastrophic disaster when the city of Oslo is threatened by a devastating earthquake. Norwegian with English subtitles.

Adventure.title: Quantum of Solace
Adventure.description: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.

Adventure.title: Racetime
Adventure.description: After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race.

Adventure.title: Radioflash
Adventure.description: In the aftermath of an apocalyptic power outage, a young woman encounters the horrors awaiting her in the darkness as she tries to reunite her family and fight for survival.

Adventure.title: Rambo
Adventure.description: Sylvester Stallone returns to the iconic character of John Rambo in this action sequel that finds the middle-aged veteran living quietly in Thailand as a mechanic and snake wrangler - until a group of American missionaries are caught up in the bloody Burmese civil war raging nearby and reach out to the reluctant killing machine for rescue. Julie Benz, Paul Schulze and Ken Howard costar in this long-awaited follow-up.

Adventure.title: Rango
Adventure.description: A chameleon that aspires to be a swashbuckling hero finds himself in a Western town plagued by bandits and is forced to literally play the role in order to protect it.

Adventure.title: Rare Exports: A Christmas Tale
Adventure.description: In this darkly comic gem, it's Christmas Eve in northern Finland, and an archeological dig has just unearthed Santa Claus. But this Santa isn't one you want coming to town.

Adventure.title: Red
Adventure.description: Retired assassins are targeted for death in this comic action adventure.

Adventure.title: The Reunion
Adventure.description: After the death of her father, a daughter fulfills his last wish and finds a way to bring her three brothers back together.

Adventure.title: The Road to El Dorado
Adventure.description: When treasure hunters, Tulio (Kevin Kline) and Miguel (Kenneth Branagh) are mistaken for gods, they face a difficult decision: keep the riches or battle the odds to save El Dorado!

Adventure.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
Adventure.description: Kevin Costner plays the world's most famous outlaw as he leads his band of merry men--and women--against the evil Sheriff of Nottingham.

Adventure.title: Running with the Devil
Adventure.description: When a cocaine shipment is compromised, a drug cartel’s CEO, known as The Boss orders his most trusted henchman, The Cook, and his partner, another master drug trafficker known as The Man, on a dangerous journey to audit the company’s supply chain.

Adventure.title: Rustlers' Rhapsody
Adventure.description: Rex O'Herlihan, The Singing Cowboy, finds himself in a cliché town where an evil cattle baron and some new cowboys conspire to force sheep ranchers out of their valley.

Adventure.title: Safe
Adventure.description: Mei, a young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued by the Triads, the Russian mob, and corrupt NYC cops. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

Adventure.title: The Saint
Adventure.description: Want someone to infiltrate a top-secret organiz ation or steal a scientific formula that could change the world? For the right price, The Saint's your man.

Adventure.title: Sands of Iwo Jima
Adventure.description: A dramatization of the World War II Battle of Iwo Jima.

Adventure.title: A Score to Settle
Adventure.description: With only a short time to live, Frankie Carver is released from prison, vowing to track down every last member of the gang that betrayed him.

Adventure.title: The Secret of the Nutcracker
Adventure.description: In this innovative version of the world famous Christmas story, 12-year-old Clara takes a magical journey on Christmas Eve to find her father in a World War II Prisoner of War camp.

Adventure.title: Sheep and Wolves
Adventure.description: In a magical land faraway lives a flock of carefree sheep. When their stress-free life is interrupted by a pack of wolves, the pack's favorite goofball, Grey, takes on the challenge of proving to everyone that he is a worthy leader.

Adventure.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
Adventure.description: Sinbad the sailor must retrieve the stolen Book of Peace from a goddess with a penchant for chaos in this mythological animated tale.

Adventure.title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
Adventure.description: After heroically defeating both the Snow Queen and the Snow King, Gerda, a selfless adventurer, is struggling with the disappearance of her parents. In order to find them, Gerda and her friends go on a dangerous mission.

Adventure.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
Adventure.description: Sandra Bullock and Jason Patric star as a young couple whose dream cruise turns to terror when a lunatic computer genius (Willem Dafoe) sets a new course for destruction.

Adventure.title: Spider-Man 3
Adventure.description: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

Adventure.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
Adventure.description: A wild horse yearns to be free after he is captured by a nasty U.S. colonel in this 2002 Oscar(R)-nominee for Best Animated Feature.

Adventure.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
Adventure.description: Marissa Cortez Wilson (Jessica Alba) is a retired spy who keeps that identity hidden from her clueless husband and whip-smart twin stepchildren, Rebecca (Rowan Blanchard) and Cecil (Mason Cook). However, when a villain called Timekeeper (Jeremy Piven) threatens to conquer the world, Marissa springs back into action as head of the OSS, home of the now-defunct Spy Kids Division. With help from some cool gadgets and two former spy kids, Rebecca and Cecil join the fight to save Earth.

Adventure.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
Adventure.description: After being dumped by her boyfriend who is a spy, a woman and her friend become embroiled in a conspiracy.

Adventure.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Adventure.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Adventure.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Adventure.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Adventure.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
Adventure.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Adventure.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
Adventure.description: The crews of the Enterprise and the Excelsior must stop a plot to prevent a peace treaty between the Klingon Empire and the Federation.

Adventure.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
Adventure.description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of the federation plot against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Capt. Picard begins an open rebellion.

Adventure.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
Adventure.description: This first Star Trek film reunites the U.S.S. Enterprise's original crew. Capt. James T. Kirk now an admiral, and his crew must save humanity from an alien ship steadily approaching Earth and destroying everything in its path.

Adventure.title: Stargate
Adventure.description: When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

Adventure.title: A Stork's Journey
Adventure.description: An orphaned sparrow is adopted and raised by storks. When the family leaves on its annual migration, the little sparrow attempts to participate in the long, arduous journey.

Adventure.title: Strategic Air Command
Adventure.description: Aviation and sports come together as a baseball player is recalled to Air Force duty.

Adventure.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
Adventure.description: Shortly after the Royal Family adopts a young girl named Alise, she is taken away into the forest. Princess Odette, Derek and their woodland friends, must work together to find a way to bring her home to the castle.

Adventure.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Myztery
Adventure.description: Your favorite characters are back in an all-new royal adventure! It seems that a mysterious "Z" is appearing as a mark on the palace residents. Who is behind the mark and what does it mean?

Adventure.title: The Swan Princess: Princess Tomorrow, Pirate Today
Adventure.description: With her parents away for the summer, fun-loving, young Princess Alise must spend her time with Queen Uberta, training to be the perfect, proper royal. But what she really wants is to become a swashbuckling pirate!

Adventure.title: The Swan Princess: The Mystery of the Enchanted Treasure
Adventure.description: The spirited animals of Swan Lake help their prince and princess save the kingdom from a sinister sorceress.

Adventure.title: Tall Stranger
Adventure.description: In the post-Civil War Colorado Territory, a rancher rescued from death by a wagon-train demonstrates his gratitude by guiding the train to the newly-opened land. He also finds the rustlers who shot him, as well as true love.

Adventure.title: Tank 432
Adventure.description: In this claustrophobic thriller, an abandoned tank becomes a metal tomb for a group of soldiers hunted by an alien horror bent on annihilation.

Adventure.title: The Terminator
Adventure.description: Arnold Schwarzenegger is unforgettable as an unstoppable cyborg who is sent back in time to kill a young woman in this sci-fi classic.

Adventure.title: Tetsuo: The Bullet Man
Adventure.description: Calm office worker Anthony, son of an American father and a Japanese mother, lives in Tokyo with his wife Yuriko and their little son Tom. Since Anthony’s mother died of cancer, his scientist father has been overly fearful for their health and rigidly subjects Anthony and Tom to monthly physicals. Walking home, Tom is killed in a hit and run before Anthony’s eyes. Losing their boy pushes Yuriko over the edge and triggers violent emotions in Anthony, whose body begins to transform. Little by little, his cells turn into iron. When the driver who killed Tom reappears and Anthony learns the truth about his father’s past experiments on human guinea pigs and about his mother’s death, Anthony mutates into a mass of metal, a human weapon fuelled by an uncontrollable rage.

Adventure.title: The Three Musketeers
Adventure.description: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

Adventure.title: Tiny Toon Adventures: Night Ghoulery
Adventure.description: A framework that's more than slightly similar to Rod Serling's "Night Gallery" and several other tales of horror and hilarity with a typical Tiny Toons twist.

Adventure.title: The Tracker
Adventure.description: A mysterious stranger travels to a remote village where, 15 years earlier, his wife and daughter were kidnapped.

Adventure.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
Adventure.description: When Apollo 11 landed the Moon in 1969, the government discovered an alien spacecraft with technology it kept secret from the Autobots. Presented by FXM

Adventure.title: Trolls World Tour
Adventure.description: When the kingdom is invaded by Rock Trolls, Queen Poppy (Anna Kendrick) and Branch (Justin Timberlake) embark on an epic quest to find the harmony that will save them all.

Adventure.title: True Grit
Adventure.description: A tough U.S. Marshal helps a stubborn young woman track down her father's murderer.

Adventure.title: UglyDolls
Adventure.description: An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.

Adventure.title: Ultraviolet
Adventure.description: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright, Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this story of a woman caught in a futuristic civil war between the government and a subculture of disease modified humans in whom speed, strength and intelligence are magnified.

Adventure.title: Unlocked
Adventure.description: A CIA interrogator tries to prevent an imminent terrorist attack.

Adventure.title: Walking Tall
Adventure.description: Based on true events in the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser, who "removes" corruption in his county with a four-foot-long wooden club.

Adventure.title: Warpath
Adventure.description: Action-packed Western film involving O'Brien's hunt for the outlaws who murdered his girlfriend.

Adventure.title: Warrior
Adventure.description: WARRIOR tells the inspirational story of an estranged family that finds redemption in the unlikeliest of places-the MMA ring.

Adventure.title: The Wave
Adventure.description: Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.

Adventure.title: The Way Back
Adventure.description: Four-time Oscar nominee Ed Harris, Jim Sturgess and Oscar nominee Saoirse Ronan and Colin Farrell star in this epic saga of survival from six-time Oscar-nominee Peter Weir. Inspired by an incredible true story.

Adventure.title: We Die Young
Adventure.description: Lucas, a 14-year-old boy inducted into the gang life in Washington D.C., is determined that his 10-year-old brother won't follow the same path. When an Afghanistan war veteran comes into the neighborhood, an opportunity arises.

Adventure.title: Wild Card
Adventure.description: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss

Adventure.title: Wolf Warrior 2
Adventure.description: China's deadliest special forces operative settles into a quiet life on the sea. When sadistic mercenaries begin targeting nearby civilians, he must leave his newfound peace behind and return to his duties as a soldier and protector.

Adventure.title: Woman at War
Adventure.description: Halla declares a one-woman-war on the local aluminum industry. But as she prepares to abandon her role as environmental activist to become a mother, she decides to plot one final attack to deal the aluminum industry a crippling blow.

Adventure.title: Wonder Park
Adventure.description: Wonder Park tells the story of a magnificent amusement park where the imagination of a wildly creative girl named June comes alive.

Adventure.title: Zapped
Adventure.description: Zoey discovers a smartphone app that magically controls boys.

Anime.title: (Dub) Afro Samurai Resurrection
Anime.description: Afro Samurai found peace after avenging his father. But the master is forced back into the game by sexy Sio, a deadly woman from his past who won't quit until Afro pays for his sins. Starring Samuel L. Jackson and Lucy Liu.

Anime.title: (Dub) Akira
Anime.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

Anime.title: (Dub) Dragon Age: Dawn of the Seeker
Anime.description: A brash young Seeker - Cassandra - is accused of treason as she fights a conspiracy that threatens the realm's most powerful religious order. With her life on the line, she must clear her name and expose those working to destroy the Divine.

Anime.title: (Dub) Grave of the Fireflies
Anime.description: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, they struggle to survive in this heartbreaking story detailing the true casualties of war.

Anime.title: (Dub) Mass Effect: Paragon Lost
Anime.description: Mass Effect: Paragon Lost, the prequel to best-selling Mass Effect 3, follows the early career of Alliance Marine, James Vega, as he leads an elite Special Forces squad into battle against mysterious aliens known as The Collectors.

Anime.title: (Dub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
Anime.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

Anime.title: (Sub) Akira
Anime.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

Anime.title: (Sub) Fafner: Heaven and Earth
Anime.description: A hiveminded alien force reengages war with Tatsumiya Island years after Kazuki led a team of mech pilots to destroy them. In an explosive battle over the fate of humankind, the young warriors risk everything to save their only home from assimilation.

Anime.title: (Sub) Fairy Tail the Movie: Phoenix Priestess
Anime.description: Natsu and his mighty team of mages face evil rising from the embers in this action-packed feature-length exclusive! When a prince seeking immortality unleashes an ancient force, a raging war becomes the fiercest inferno the wizards have ever faced!

Anime.title: (Sub) Grave of the Fireflies
Anime.description: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, they struggle to survive in this heartbreaking story detailing the true casualties of war.

Anime.title: (Sub) K MISSING KINGS
Anime.description: Ever since the School Island Incident, in which the four Kings were involved, the Silver Clansman, Kuroh Yatogami and Neko were on their search for their master Shiro.

Anime.title: (Sub) Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky
Anime.description: Ten years ago, an invasion by the Erebonians almost shattered the Kingdom of Liberl. For Estelle Bright it’s all ancient history. But history repeats; as Estelle and her brother find themselves in the wrong place when mayhem breaks out.

Anime.title: (Sub) Ninja Scroll
Anime.description: When Jubei saves a young ninja woman from the unthinkable, he assumes that’s the end of it. To his surprise, it’s only just the beginning.

Anime.title: (Sub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
Anime.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

Anime.title: (Sub) Trigun: Badlands Rumble
Anime.description: Twenty years ago, Vash the Stampede allowed an infamous outlaw named Gasback to escape final justice. Now, on the streets of Macca City, Vash is about to learn a hard truth about consequences - and he might end up paying for the lesson with his life.

Anime.title: Pokémon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction
Anime.description: Ash must help Diancie and stop Yveltal's rampage!

Anime.title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
Anime.description: Ash must help Hoopa overcome its own darkness!

Anime.title: Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel
Sword Art Online Extra Edition
Anime.description: Kirito and the others decide to go on an underwater quest to allow Yui to see a whale, but face a shocking revelation… Suguha is afraid of water. So, Asuna and the other girls decide to teach Suguha how to swim. Meanwhile, Kirito is meeting somebody...

Black Stories.title: Barbershop
Black Stories.description: An eventful day in the life of a barbershop on Chicago's south side is the setting for this hit comedy..

Black Stories.title: Black Cop
Black Stories.description: A police officer is pushed to the edge after being profiled and assaulted by his colleagues, setting him on a skewed mission of vengeance on the privileged. A satire on police, social media and racial tension

Black Stories.title: The Color Purple
Black Stories.description: Celie, a Southern Black woman, gains self-respect as she strives to educate herself and to find love--despite an abusive spouse and a society biased against her race and her sex.

Black Stories.title: Detroit
Black Stories.description: From the Academy Award winning director of THE HURT LOCKER and ZERO DARK THIRTY, DETROIT tells the gripping story of one of the most terrifying moments during the civil unrest that rocked Detroit in the summer of '67.

Black Stories.title: The Gospel According to André
Black Stories.description: This intimate portrait for André Leon Tally, a fixture in the world of fashion, takes viewers on a journey from André’s roots growing up to becoming one of the most influential tastemakers and fashion curators of our times.

Black Stories.title: Grace Jones: Bloodlight and Bami
Black Stories.description: A larger-than-life entertainer, an androgynous glam-pop diva – Grace Jones is all these things and more. Sophie Fiennes’s documentary goes beyond the traditional music biography, offering a portrait as stylish and unconventional as its subject.

Black Stories.title: Kiki
Black Stories.description: 25 years after 'Paris Is Burning' introduced the art of voguing to the world, Kiki revisits New York City's thriving underground ballroom scene. It's a larger-than-life world in which LGBTQ youths of color are empowered by staging elaborate dance competitions that showcase their dynamic choreography, fabulous costumes, and fierce attitude. It's also a safe haven for struggling, at-risk teens who find acceptance, support, and friendship within the Kiki community. Granted intimate access to the scene, filmmaker Sara Jordenö introduces viewers to some of Kiki culture's most prominent personalities, going beyond the glamour of the balls to highlight the serious challenges facing queer black and Latino young people. Bringing together heartrending personal stories with incredible displays of creative expression, Kiki is 'exhilarating…an indelible, must-see ode to gay New York' (Manohla Dargis, The New York Times).

Black Stories.title: Monsters and Men
Black Stories.description: A bystander films the death of a black man at the hands of police, which sparks rising tensions in a New York neighborhood as some are moved to take a stand.

Black Stories.title: Premature
Black Stories.description: A young woman finds herself on the precipice of adulthood as she navigates her way through the highs and lows of a life-changing summer romance in Harlem.

Black Stories.title: The Rape of Recy Taylor
Black Stories.description: In 1944, when African-American wife and mother Recy Taylor is gang raped by seven white men in Alabama, she speaks out against her attackers, putting herself and her family in danger.

Black Stories.title: Reasonable Doubt
Black Stories.description: A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when he's involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime.

Black Stories.title: Sorry to Bother You
Black Stories.description: In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a macabre universe.

Black Stories.title: Sugar Hill
Black Stories.description: Two brothers have left their traumatic, poverty-stricken childhood behind to become Harlem's most powerful drug lords.

Black Stories.title: Support the Girls
Black Stories.description: Regina Hall (Girls Trip) stars as the hardworking manager of a "sports bar with curves" who runs the joint like a family, even as sketchy employees, bad customers and an even worse boss put her good nature to the test.

Black Stories.title: Whose Streets?
Black Stories.description: Told by the activists and leaders who live and breathe this movement for justice, Whose Streets? is an unflinching look at the Ferguson uprising. When unarmed teenager Michael Brown is killed by police and left lying in the street for hours, it marks a breaking point for the residents of St. Louis, Missouri. Grief, long-standing racial tensions and renewed anger bring residents together to hold vigil and protest this latest tragedy. Empowered parents, artists, and teachers from around the country come together as freedom fighters. As the National Guard descends on Ferguson with military grade weaponry, these young community members become the torchbearers of a new resistance. Filmmakers Sabaah Folayan and Damon Davis know this story because they are the story. Whose Streets? is a powerful battle cry from a generation fighting, not for their civil rights, but for the right to live.

Black Stories.title: Zapped
Black Stories.description: Zoey discovers a smartphone app that magically controls boys.

Classics.title: A Bridge too Far
Classics.description: Sir Richard Attenborough directs Sean Connery, Gene Hackman, Anthony Hopkins and Robert Redford in this gripping and controversial tale about a daring WWII military operation.

Classics.title: Footloose
Classics.description: An urban teenager who moves to a small town dominated by a fundamentalist preacher wages an ambitious war against adult repression.

Classics.title: The Furies
Classics.description: Western depicting the clash between a self-made cattle king of the Old West and his equally iron-willed daughter. Based on Niven Busch's novel.

Classics.title: Heathers
Classics.description: Westerburg High School's elite clique of popular girls is "The Heathers," comprised of the powerful Heather Chandler, the green-with-envy Heather Duke, and the cowardly Heather McNamara. Rounding out the foursome is Veronica Sawyer (Winona Ryder), who is so fed up with the Heathers and the entire peer pressure cooker that she starts running with J.D. (Christian Slater), a mysterious - and possibly psychotic - motorcycle-riding newcomer. But what begins as their noble effort to rid Westerburg of its bad apples ends up taking a real toll. And their teen rebellion produces a serious and mounting body count. Shannen Doherty co-stars in this cruelly hilarious dark comedy, which became one of the biggest cult classics of the '80s.

Classics.title: A Man Alone
Classics.description: Framed for a robbery, a gunman hides out in the home of the local sheriff and gradually wins his trust and respect. Now they must face the vengeful townspeople in a bloody war.

Classics.title: Mississippi Burning
Classics.description: When three civil rights workers disappear in 1964 Mississippi, two FBI agents with wildly divergent styles resort to increasingly violent tactics to apprehend the culprit Ku Klux Klan. Crucial to the case is the testimony of a beautician.

Classics.title: Pony Express
Classics.description: In 1860, Buffalo Bill Cody and Wild Bill Hickok are sent to establish a Pony Express service across California.

Classics.title: Sands of Iwo Jima
Classics.description: A dramatization of the World War II Battle of Iwo Jima.

Classics.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Classics.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Classics.title: Tall Stranger
Classics.description: In the post-Civil War Colorado Territory, a rancher rescued from death by a wagon-train demonstrates his gratitude by guiding the train to the newly-opened land. He also finds the rustlers who shot him, as well as true love.

Classics.title: The Terminator
Classics.description: Arnold Schwarzenegger is unforgettable as an unstoppable cyborg who is sent back in time to kill a young woman in this sci-fi classic.

Classics.title: West Side Story
Classics.description: Natalie Wood and Richard Beymer star in this classic musical retelling of 'Romeo and Juliet' set among New York's warring gangs.

Comedy.title: The 10 Year Plan
Comedy.description: Myles and Brody are two best friends who make a pact to be a couple if neither has found love in ten years’ time. Now that their arrangement is due, both friends do whatever it takes to avoid becoming each other’s last resort.

Comedy.title: 12 Dog Days Till Christmas
Comedy.description: A troubled teen sentenced to community service at a dog shelter helps find homes for unadopted strays and, in the process, discovers romance, family, and responsibility for himself.

Comedy.title: 2 Days in Paris
Comedy.description: 2 Days in Paris, follows a New York couple, French photographer Marion (Julie Delpy), and American interior designer Jack (Adam Goldberg), as they attempt to re-infuse their relationship with romance on a European vacation.

Comedy.title: 2nd Date Sex
Comedy.description: How Bad can a second date get? Laura and Ryan are about to find out.

Comedy.title: 35 and Ticking
Comedy.description: Four friends are approaching the age of 35 and struggling to build families they've dreamed of. They try to rectify their romantic lives and futures while their biological clocks tick away.

Comedy.title: 4th Man Out
Comedy.description: Adam, a small-town mechanic, decides it’s time to tell his friends and family he’s gay. Will his straight-as-an-arrow best bros have his back? A lighthearted and unexpectedly subversive comedy about coming out of the blue-collar closet.

Comedy.title: 50 First Dates
Comedy.description: A man falls in love with a woman after a memorable encounter. However, he discovers that she suffers from severe short-term memory loss and has no idea who he is. To win her, he must get her to fall in love with him all over again every day.

Comedy.title: Abominable
Comedy.description: When mischievous friends Yi (Chloe Bennet), Jin, and Peng discover a young yeti on their roof, they name him Everest and embark on a thrilling adventure to reunite the magical creature with his family. On the journey of their lifetimes, Everest helps Yi, Jin, and Peng unlock an inner bravery they didn’t know they had. And as they travel across China to return the magical creature to his home, Everest will help them discover where they truly belong, too.

Comedy.title: Action Point
Comedy.description: A daredevil designs and operates his own theme park with his friends.

Comedy.title: Adam
Comedy.description: Directed by trans filmmaker Rhys Ernst, this adaptation tells the thought-provoking story of a cisgender male, who, after falling in love with a lesbian, goes on a journey of learning about LGBTQ culture.

Comedy.title: The Alchemist Cookbook
Comedy.description: Young outcast Sean has isolated himself in a trailer in the woods with his cat Kaspar. When he turns from chemistry to black magic to crack nature’s secret, things go awry and he awakens something far more sinister and dangerous.

Comedy.title: All About E
Comedy.description: A sexy young DJ, E, and her gay best friend, Matt, are forced to run when E stumbles on some cash. But E finds she has burnt too many bridges and there is nowhere to run but outback Australia into the arms of the ex-girlfriend, Trish, who broke her heart.

Comedy.title: All Square
Comedy.description: A down-on-his-luck bookie befriends an ex-girlfriend's son and begins taking bets on his youth league baseball games, creating chaos in the community.

Comedy.title: Almost Adults
Comedy.description: A platonic love story about two life long best friends struggling to keep their friendship together as their lives head in different directions.

Comedy.title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong
Comedy.description: Ruby and Josh spent an unforgettable night together in Hong Kong a year ago, and now their brief encounter is about to get a second chance. This charming walk and talk romance takes full advantage of the magical landscape that is Hong Kong at night.

Comedy.title: Alright Now
Comedy.description: ALRIGHT NOW follows a rock musician (Cobie Smulders, “How I Met Your Mother”) who drunkenly enrolls in college after she breaks up with her boyfriend and her rock band falls apart....what could go wrong?

Comedy.title: American Ultra
Comedy.description: Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart star in this explosive action-adventure about a small-town slacker.

Comedy.title: Anchor and Hope
Comedy.description: A lesbian couple, living a simple life, decide to have a child. A comedy starring Oona Chaplin and her mother Geraldine Chaplin.

Comedy.title: And So It Goes
Comedy.description: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

Comedy.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
Comedy.description: A zombie apocalypse threatens the sleepy town of Little Haven - at Christmas – forcing Anna and her friends to fight, slash and sing their way to survival, facing the undead in a desperate race to reach their loved ones.

Comedy.title: Another Time
Comedy.description: The top investment manager at his firm is assigned to help the stunning owner of a recently acquired company. He realizes he has fallen for her, and he has to go back in time to meet her before she becomes engaged.

Comedy.title: The Ant Bully
Comedy.description: Adaptation of the John Nickle picture book about a boy who gets shrunk to insect size after hosing down the inhabitants of an anthill with his water gun.

Comedy.title: Antz
Comedy.description: A small worker ant switch places with a soldier ant to win the heart of the beautiful princess. A comedy-adventure featuring Sharon Stone, Sylvester Stallone and Woody Allen.

Comedy.title: Anywhere But Here
Comedy.description: A free-spirited woman in search of a better life leaves her husband and drives to L.A. with her teenage daughter.

Comedy.title: The Art of Self-Defense
Comedy.description: A random assault turns a mild-mannered accountant into a lethal martial artist in The Art of Self-Defense, an audaciously original dark comedy that takes the idea of toxic masculinity to absurd extremes.

Comedy.title: Assassination Nation
Comedy.description: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

Comedy.title: Back to School
Comedy.description: Thornton Melon (Rodney Dangerfield) is concerned that his son Jason (Keith Gordon) is unsure whether to go to college, so the uneducated self-made millionaire encourages him by signing up as a student as well. As Jason tries to establish himself among his peers and make the diving team, Thornton falls for a pretty professor (Sally Kellerman) and gets others do his schoolwork for him. When the suspicious dean (Paxton Whitehead) finds out, Thornton needs to show he can get by on his own.

Comedy.title: Bad Girls From Mars
Comedy.description: This movie within a movie has a sexy vixen from Europe arriving in Hollywood to star in a sci-fi flick where everybody is done-in before, during, and after some dangerous bedroom liaisons.

Comedy.title: Bad Roomies
Comedy.description: Two guys find a beautiful young woman to take the place of their missing roommate. Everything seems fine until a horrible mistake on drunken night leads all three on a downward spiral.

Comedy.title: Barbershop
Comedy.description: An eventful day in the life of a barbershop on Chicago's south side is the setting for this hit comedy..

Comedy.title: Barking Dogs Never Bite
Comedy.description: In Bong Joon-ho’s directorial debut, a couple is driven to distraction by a yapping dog located in their apartment complex. Determined to relieve their annoyance, they take extreme action against his tormentor.

Comedy.title: The Beach Bum
Comedy.description: Moondog is a fun-loving, pot-smoking, beer-drinking writer who lives life on his own terms in Florida. If he can put down the drugs for just one minute, he may finally be able to put his talent to good use and finish the next great American novel.

Comedy.title: Because I Said So
Comedy.description: Diane Keaton stars with Mandy Moore and Lauren Graham in this comedy about a worried mother who meddles in her daughter's love life, doing all the wrong things for all the right reasons.

Comedy.title: Bees Make Honey
Comedy.description: Bees Make Honey is a stylish 1930’s British comedy murder mystery set during a raucous party in a stately manor home. Based on true events from World War II, the language and mood offers a throwback to period rhythms with a modern ironic twist.

Comedy.title: The Bellboy
Comedy.description: Stanley is a quiet bellboy just doing his job at the Fountainbleau Hotel in Miami Beach. One day, Jerry Lewis, the big star, arrives at the hotel and some of the staff notices the striking resemblance between them.

Comedy.title: Benjamin
Comedy.description: A family calls in an intervention for Benjamin, their teenage son whom they believe to be hooked on crystal meth. Soon, it becomes clear that those who are confronting Benjamin's problem also have many problems of their own.

Comedy.title: Bernie the Dolphin
Comedy.description: In this heartwarming family adventure, the search for a missing dolphin leads two kids to uncover a real-estate development plan that endangers the sea life on a Florida beach.

Comedy.title: Bernie the Dolphin 2
Comedy.description: The kids are thrilled that Bernie has come back. But so has their old enemy Winston, who's about to kidnap the talented dolphin. Kevin and Holly must rescue their splashy friend before it's too late.

Comedy.title: Best in Show
Comedy.description: At the prestigious Mayflower Dog Show, a "documentary film crew"captures the excitement and tension displayed by the eccentricparticipants in the outrageously hilarious satire Best In Show.This biting send-up exposes the wondrously diverse dog owners who travelfrom all over America to showcase their four-legged contenders.Mild-mannered salesman Gerry Fleck (Eugene Levy) and his vivacious wife,Cookie (Catherine O'Hara), happily prepare their Norwich Terrier, whileshop owner Harlan Pepper (Christopher Guest) hopes his Bloodhound winstop prize. As two upwardly mobile attorneys (Parker Posey and MichaelHitchcock) anxiously ready their neurotic Weimaraner and an ecstaticallyhappy gay couple (Michael McKean and John Michael Higgins) dote on theirtiny Shih Tzu, inept commentator Buck Laughlin (Fred Willard) vainlyattempts to provide colorful tidbits about each breed.

Comedy.title: Between Us
Comedy.description: Longtime couple Henry (Ben Feldman) and Dianne (Olivia Thirlby) are afraid that if they finally tie the knot it will lead to the end of their days as free-spirited urbanites. But a whirlwind night apart, involving temptations from a duo of strangers, will either make them realize why they are together in the first place or finally drive them apart forever.

Comedy.title: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
Comedy.description: Russ Meyer's sexploitation classic about an all-girl rock group that gets caught up in life in the fast lane.

Comedy.title: Big Time Adolescence
Comedy.description: A seemingly bright and mostly innocent 16-year-old named Mo (Griffin Gluck) attempts to navigate high school under the guidance of his best friend Zeke (Pete Davidson), an unmotivated-yet-charismatic college dropout. Although Zeke genuinely cares about Mo, things start to go awry as he teaches Mo nontraditional life lessons in drug dealing, partying, and dating. Meanwhile, Mo’s well-meaning dad (Jon Cryer) tries to step in and take back the reins of his son’s upbringing.

Comedy.title: Big Time Movie
Comedy.description: Big Time Rush is off to London on their first world tour, but as soon as they arrive they're mixed up in a mission to save the world. With their bags switched at their airport, the boys are stuck with a fearsome device that could destroy the world.

Comedy.title: Billboard Dad
Comedy.description: Two sisters (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) print a personals ad on a billboard to find a match for their newly single father.

Comedy.title: The Binge
Comedy.description: In the not so distant future all drinking and drugs have been made completely illegal by the government... except for one night a year. High school seniors, Griffin, Hags and Andrew make a pilgrimage to get to the best party in town where all their dreams will come true... Sure they will have to avoid their crazed principal (Vince Vaughn), violent siblings and the wild animals roaming the streets, but that’s all part of the fun! Their friendship will be tested, love lives will be rattled and their brains completely scrambled. One thing is for sure, no one’s life is EVER the same after participating in The Binge

Comedy.title: The Birdcage
Comedy.description: Robin Williams, Gene Hackman, Nathan Lane and Dianne Wiest lead the laughs in this wild comedy that insists you don't have to be a woman to be a mother.

Comedy.title: Blurt
Comedy.description: Nice guy Jeremy (Jace Norman) loses his ability to keep his thoughts to himself and can't help but say everything out loud. The only way to fix his problem will be the hardest thing he'll have to do: win the school election.

Comedy.title: Bolt
Comedy.description: Bolt is the star of a hit TV show. The problem is he thinks it's real.

Comedy.title: Boogie Woogie
Comedy.description: Modern art collectors in London scheme to acquire a valuable painting.

Comedy.title: Book Club
Comedy.description: Four friends' lives are turned upside down to hilarious ends when their book club tackles the infamous Fifty Shades of Grey.

Comedy.title: Booksmart
Comedy.description: Booksmart is a comedy about two academic superstars and best friends on a mission to cram four years of fun into one night.

Comedy.title: The Boy Downstairs
Comedy.description: An aspiring writer returns to New York after a few years abroad, only to discover that her ex-boyfriend is living in the same building.

Comedy.title: A Boy Named Charlie Brown
Comedy.description: Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the Peanuts gang in their feature film debut! Charlie has a chance to win the respect of his friends when he enters a school spelling bee and winds up in the big city for the finals.

Comedy.title: Breakup at a Wedding
Comedy.description: A videographer captures an engaged couple's decision to proceed with a sham wedding after the bride calls off the ceremony and decides to break up with her partner, who secretly hopes that his surprise gift will ultimately change her mind.

Comedy.title: Broken Lizard's Club Dread
Comedy.description: A serial killer stalks victims at a hedonistic island resort in this screwball slasher spoof from the comedy troupe Broken Lizard.

Comedy.title: The Brothers McMullen
Comedy.description: Three Irish-Catholic brothers deal with their respective lady troubles in Edward Burns' acclaimed indie film.

Comedy.title: Buffaloed
Comedy.description: A woman is desperate to escape her life in Buffalo and finds a way by becoming a debt collector.

Comedy.title: Buffy, the Vampire Slayer
Comedy.description: Sometimes it takes more than just good looks to kill. Buffy Summers (Kristy Swanson) is just an ordinary teenager - or so she thinks. She's a cheerleader. She loves shopping. She's got a nice, normal, life at the top of the high school food chain. However, there's something higher on the food chain than her...One night, Buffy meets Merrick (Donald Sutherland), a mysterious stranger who tells Buffy that her hometown is plagued by vampires, and that she is the chosen one, her generation's reincarnation of a pure female warrior - a Vampire Slayer.This Merrick guy is, like, totally a head case, right? Right? Soon after, kids in her school (including her friend Cassandra) turn up first missing, then dead with two little bite marks in their necks. To her horror, it soon becomes obvious that Merrick was telling the truth, and that Buffy must put aside her shopping and her cheerleading and embrace her destiny... as the Slayer. Popularity can wait.

Comedy.title: The Cabin in the Woods
Comedy.description: In this twisted thriller, five friends arrive at a secluded cabin with clear instructions for their anticipated mountain getaway. But when the rigid rules are broken, punishment is swift and everyone will pay.

Comedy.title: California Dreamin' (Nesfarsit)
Comedy.description: A railway chief delays a shipment of weapons for NATO forces during the Kosovo War in 1999.

Comedy.title: Cantinflas
Comedy.description: Cantinflas is the untold story of Mexico's greatest and most beloved comedy film star of all time.

Comedy.title: Captain Fantastic
Comedy.description: A father raising his six kids in the Pacific Northwest is forced to leave.

Comedy.title: Cashback
Comedy.description: Ben develops insomnia after a painful breakup. To kill time, he takes a night shift at the local supermarket. Dealing with the boredom of an eight-hour shift, Ben imagines freezing time, which allows him to see the beauty of the everyday world.

Comedy.title: The Catechism Cataclysm
Comedy.description: Wild characters meld together in this divinely bizarre & funny tale, as two childhood friends reunite for a crazy canoe trip.

Comedy.title: Cats & Dogs
Comedy.description: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, which their human owners are blissfully unaware of.

Comedy.title: Change of Plans
Comedy.description: A smart and sexy comedy about a group of dinner party guests who slowly reveal hidden secrets and passionate affairs.

Comedy.title: Changeland
Comedy.description: Directed by and starring Seth Green, the film follows two estranged best friends on a life-changing trip to Thailand. This epic journey reminds them that there's no problem that friendship and a few rounds in a Thai boxing ring can't fix.

Comedy.title: Cherry Pop
Comedy.description: Cherry Pop, directed by Assaad Yacoub, follows one wild, crazy night at a drag club. The matriarch of the show Zaza refuses to come out of her dressing room, while a young newcomer, The Cherry, is tormented by the regular troupe of back-stabbing queens.

Comedy.title: Chicken Run
Comedy.description: The creators of Wallace & Gromit bring you an exciting story about a group of chickens led by Rocky (Mel Gibson) who are determined to fly the coop–even if they can’t fly!

Comedy.title: A Christmas Kiss II
Comedy.description: A passionate, mistletoe-instigated kiss in an elevator inspires a millionaire playboy and his sister’s relationship, gun-shy executive assistant to take a romantic leap of faith at Christmas.

Comedy.title: Christmas With the Andersons
Comedy.description: The Anderson family always goes all out for Christmas, but this year will be different when Michael loses his job just before the holidays. With wacky Aunt Katie visiting, though, she helps remind them Christmas can be fun with no money.

Comedy.title: A Cinderella Christmas
Comedy.description: The Christmasquerade Ball gives hardworking Angie a chance to let loose. She quickly charms Nicholas but has to go suddenly, leaving him only one clue to find her in this modern, holiday take on the classic fairytale.

Comedy.title: Cinderfella
Comedy.description: Fowler is a clumsy simpleton who has to care for his step mother and her two stuck-up sons Maximilian and Rupert. Only in the realms of fantasy can he find comfort. One day a good spirit appears and helps him win the heart of a beautiful princess.

Comedy.title: City Slickers
Comedy.description: Billy Crystal, Daniel Stern and Jack Palance star as three middle-aged men experiencing midlife crises, who embark on an adventure to find renewal and purpose.

Comedy.title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
Comedy.description: Three urban buddies trek to the Wild West seeking a fortune in lost gold.

Comedy.title: The Cleanse
Comedy.description: A heartbroken man attending a spiritual retreat discovers the regimen releases more than toxins.

Comedy.title: Colossal
Comedy.description: Gloria is an out-of-work party girl forced to leave her life in New York City, and move back home. When reports surface that a giant creature is destroying Seoul, she gradually comes to the realization that she is somehow connected to this phenomenon.

Comedy.title: A Complete History of My Sexual Failures
Comedy.description: A hilarious and raunchy true story about a filmmaker who interviews his ex's about why they dumped him to try and figure out why his love life is such a disaster.

Comedy.title: The Con Is On
Comedy.description: This stylish, star-studded caper comedy stars Uma Thurman and Tim Roth as a con-artist couple cooking up a jewel-theft scam in LA to pay off a sexy, deadly British gangster.

Comedy.title: Cool Blue
Comedy.description: Aspiring Los Angeles painter Dustin (Woody Harrelson) has a one-night stand with the beautiful but mysterious Christiane (Ely Pouget), and then realizes she may be the muse he needs to get his art career started. Unfortunately, Christiane disappears just after the tryst, so Dustin, accompanied by his best friend, Buzz (Hank Azaria), scours Southern California in search of her. Along the way, Dustin and Buzz meet a slew of oddballs, including beatnik plumber Phil (Sean Penn).

Comedy.title: Crash Pad
Comedy.description: A man thinks he has found true love with an older woman until he finds out she is married and using him to get revenge on her husband.

Comedy.title: Curious George
Comedy.description: The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.

Comedy.title: Curious George 2: Follow That Monkey!
Comedy.description: The world’s most beloved and inquisitive monkey is back in Curious George 2: Follow That Monkey, the fun-filled sequel to the hit animated movie.

Comedy.title: Curious George 3: Back to the Jungle
Comedy.description: Curious George goes on an epic adventure to space that crash lands in the jungles of Africa leading to an unforgettable journey with some new animal friends.

Comedy.title: Curious George: Royal Monkey
Comedy.description: Join your favorite monkey as he takes on his most regal role yet, trading places with a royal monkey!

Comedy.title: The Cutting Edge
Comedy.description: A hockey player teams up with a cantankerous figure skater.

Comedy.title: The Cutting Edge: Going for the Gold
Comedy.description: When Jackie, a 19 year-old Olympic-bound figure skater attempts to make a comeback from a career threatening injury, she finds an unlikely partner in a cocky, multi-talented skateboarder.

Comedy.title: D.L. Hughley: Reset
Comedy.description: D.L. Hughley's stand-up comedy special.

Comedy.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
Comedy.description: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status.

Comedy.title: Damsel
Comedy.description: Samuel Alabaster (Robert Pattinson), an affluent pioneer, ventures across the American Frontier to marry Penelope (Mia Wasikowska). As Samuel traverses the Wild West with a drunkard named Parson Henry (David Zellner), their once-simple journey grows treacherous.

Comedy.title: Daphne & Velma
Comedy.description: Daphne and Velma, two mystery-solving teens, investigate what is causing some of the brightest students at their high school to become "zombie-fied."

Comedy.title: The Day Shall Come
Comedy.description: A revolutionist becomes the target of an overzealous FBI agent's desperate ploy to expose terrorism in this hilarious farce about homeland insecurities. Anna Kendrick co-stars.

Comedy.title: Death at a Funeral
Comedy.description: Things go haywire when the members of a dysfunctional family gather for the funeral of one of their own in this dark comedy.

Comedy.title: Deck the Halls
Comedy.description: Holly (Gabrielle Carteris, Beverly Hills, 90210) returns to her hometown with her eight-year old son, Ben, to work for her father's toy business. Soon after, Ben watches a man (Steve Bacic, Big Love) move in next door with a sleigh, red suit, and lots of Christmas goodies. Ben begins to believe that their new neighbor is Santa Claus, and devises a plan to set up his mom with Santa Claus.

Comedy.title: Dog Days
Comedy.description: Dog Days is a hilarious and heartfelt comedy that follows the lives of multiple dog owners and their beloved fluffy pals around Los Angeles. When these human and canines’ paths start to intertwine, their lives begin changing in ways they never expected.

Comedy.title: A Dogwalker's Christmas Tale
Comedy.description: Luce is a reluctant dog walker this Christmas, but as she makes friends at the local dog park, including Dean, a handsome dog walker, she must take sides when her boss announces plans to bulldoze the park in the new year to build a spa.

Comedy.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
Comedy.description: Having spent most of her life exploring the jungle, nothing could prepare Dora for her most dangerous adventure yet -- high school. Accompanied by a ragtag group of teens and Boots the monkey, Dora embarks on a quest to save her parents while trying to solve the seemingly impossible mystery behind a lost Incan civilization.

Comedy.title: Drinking Buddies
Comedy.description: Although they're both dating other people, two co-workers (Olivia Wilde, Jake Johnson) hang out together in bars and try to ignore their mutual attraction.

Comedy.title: Egg
Comedy.description: An unflinching comedy about why women choose motherhood, why they revere it, fear it, and why some women forgo it. Starring Christina Hendricks ("Mad Men"), Alysia Reiner ("Orange Is the New Black"), and Anna Camp (Pitch Perfect).

Comedy.title: El Camino Hacia El Dorado
Comedy.description: Al desembarcar en las playas de El Dorado, Tulio, Miguel son confundidos con dioses y son adorados con riquezas. Deben decidir entre huir con el oro o  salvar a los pobladores de El Dorado.

Comedy.title: Electric Love
Comedy.description: “Electric Love” follows four couples as they traverse the modern dating scene in Los Angeles utilizing popular dating apps like Tinder and Grindr.

Comedy.title: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
Comedy.description: Cassandra Peterson stars in this sexy comedy hit, filled with wild wisecracks, campy chaos and scary movie spoofs.

Comedy.title: Employee of the Month
Comedy.description: A superstore slacker competes with a model employee to impress a girl.

Comedy.title: The Escort
Comedy.description: Desperate for a good story, a sex-addicted journalist throws himself into the world of high-class escorts when he starts following a Stanford-educated prostitute.

Comedy.title: Eve's Christmas
Comedy.description: On Christmas Eve, a high-powered executive's guardian angel offers her a chance to live her life again with a different spin.

Comedy.title: Evil Dead II
Comedy.description: Sam Raimi's full-throttle sequel finds whacked-out dead basher Ash battling another batch of possessed pals at a remote cabin.

Comedy.title: F the Prom
Comedy.description: Former best friends Maddy and Cole exist on opposite ends of the high school social spectrum. When Maddy’s reign as most popular girl abruptly ends, the duo reconnects as they conspire to ruin the ultimate popularity contest: senior prom.

Comedy.title: A Fairly Odd Summer
Comedy.description: When the source of all fairy magic, the Abracadabrium, accidentally falls into the wrong hands, it's up to Timmy, Tootie, Marty, and Mitzy to get it back and save the fairies in this live action Hawaiian adventure filled with lots of fairly odd madness!

Comedy.title: Fantastica: A Boonie Bears Adventure
Comedy.description: In the cartoon multiverse known as Fantastica, the intrepid robot Coco discovers the location of an ancient artifact. But with a group of thieves hot on Coco’s trail, Coco will have to rely on a group of friends to help protect Fantastica.

Comedy.title: The Female Brain
Comedy.description: What makes a woman swipe right for Mr. Wrong? Sofía Vergara and Whitney Cummings star in this fresh, witty look at the science behind our romantic missteps.

Comedy.title: The Festival
Comedy.description: After his girlfriend dumps him at graduation, a young man thinks his life is over. His best friend has the perfect solution: three days at a giant music festival.

Comedy.title: Fighting with My Family
Comedy.description: Former wrestler Ricky makes a living performing with his family. When they get the chance to audition for WWE, the family's dream seems to be coming true.  However, they find out that becoming a WWE Superstar demands more than they ever imagined possible.

Comedy.title: Filth and Wisdom
Comedy.description: Three London flat-mates (Eugene Hutz, Holly Weston, Vicky McClure) toil at demeaning jobs while dreaming of better lives.

Comedy.title: Finding Your Feet
Comedy.description: On the eve of retirement, a middle-class snob discovers her husband has been having an affair, and is forced to live with her bohemian sister on an impoverished inner-city estate.

Comedy.title: Flashback
Comedy.description: At last the Feds have caught him! Infamous 60's radical Huey Walker (Dennis Hopper) is heading for jail. So how come it's Huey's yuptight FBI escort (Kiefer Sutherland) who ends up behind bars?

Comedy.title: Flower
Comedy.description: A rebellious, quick-witted teenage girl (Zoey Deutch) living with her single mom (Kathryn Hahn) conspires with her troubled stepbrother to expose a high school teacher's (Adam Scott) dark secret.

Comedy.title: For Your Consideration
Comedy.description: The hilarious Hollywood satire For Your Consideration focuses on the making of an independent film and its cast, who become victims of awards-season hype and hoopla.

Comedy.title: Force Majeure
Comedy.description: A wickedly funny psychodrama of a model Swedish family—Tomas, his wife, and their children— on a skiing holiday. An avalanche suddenly bears down on them. Tomas makes a decision that leaves him struggling to reclaim his role as family patriarch.

Comedy.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
Comedy.description: Full-frontal hilarity ensues when a depressed composer winds up at the same Hawaiian resort as his TV star ex-girlfriend in this comedy.

Comedy.title: Freak Show
Comedy.description: Billy Bloom is talented, fierce and fearless but does he have what it takes to win homecoming queen? Bette Midler, Abigail Breslin star in this fabulous comedy.

Comedy.title: Free Birds
Comedy.description: Two turkeys discover a time machine and travel back to the first Thanksgiving to take themselves off the menu.

Comedy.title: Friends With Kids
Comedy.description: In the wake of their friends' marriages and eventual offspring, longtime pals Julie (Jennifer Westfeldt) and Jason (Adam Scott) decide to have a child together without becoming a couple. By becoming "time-share" parents, they reason, they can experience the joys of parenthood without significantly curbing their personal freedom. However, when Julie and Jason both become involved with others, they discover that they secretly harbor romantic feelings for each other.

Comedy.title: Furlough
Comedy.description: A rookie guard escorts a boisterous inmate on an emergency furlough visit.

Comedy.title: Gary Owen: I Agree with Myself
Comedy.description: Fearless and happy-go-lucky stand-up comedian Gary Owen flips every accepted, politically correct approach to family, race, gender and politics in his hilarious comedy special.

Comedy.title: Gayby
Comedy.description: "Gayby" is an irreverent comedy about friendship, growing older, sex, loneliness, and the family you chose.

Comedy.title: Getting Grace
Comedy.description: Grace, a teenage girl dying of cancer, crashes a funeral home to find out what will happen to her after she dies, but ends up teaching awkward funeral director Bill how to celebrate life.

Comedy.title: Ghost Team (Unrated)
Comedy.description: Determined to catch some ghosts on film, a paranormal-obsessed man mounts his own investigation into the beyond with his depressed best friend, misfit nephew, a cable access medium and an overeager security guard by his side.

Comedy.title: Gilbert Gottfried: Dirty Jokes
Comedy.description: Recorded live in New York City, Gilbert Gottfried at his most shocking and hilarious!  Definitely not for children ... may even be unsuitable for adults!

Comedy.title: Girlfriends of Christmas Past
Comedy.description: Expecting a proposal, Livvy gets dumped instead. She finds two more women her ex wronged and the trio decide on payback. Meanwhile, Livvy meets Carter and sparks begin to fly. Can she forget about revenge and let a Christmas romance bloom?

Comedy.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
Comedy.description: Sarah Jessica Parker, Helen Hunt and Shannen Doherty star in the outrageous '80s comedy hit that's totally packed with outrageous '80s fashions, music, dance moves, and more!

Comedy.title: Girls! Girls! Girls!
Comedy.description: Fishing boat captain, popular with the ladies, sings at night to earn enough to buy his own boat.

Comedy.title: Gloves Off
Comedy.description: A skilled fighter has to save his gym by training a gentle giant for a bare knuckle fight.

Comedy.title: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy
Comedy.description: In this outrageous comedy, a group of thirtysomethings who have been friends since high school and are known for throwing lavish parties decide to arrange an orgy in an effort to hold on to their dwindling youth.

Comedy.title: A Good Woman
Comedy.description: In 1930s Italy, a notorious seductress sets her sights on a wealthy businessman, while his new bride is pursued by a rakish playboy.

Comedy.title: Greener Grass
Comedy.description: Suburbia has never been so hilariously absurd as it is in GREENER GRASS – where one eccentric housewife is driven mad by her eagerness to please. SNL's Beck Bennett co-stars.

Comedy.title: Half Magic
Comedy.description: Three women use their newly formed sisterhood to fight against sexism, bad relationships and low self-esteem. Through embracing their wild adventures, they learn the secret to ultimate fulfillment.

Comedy.title: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
Comedy.description: An in-flight toke lands the White Castle-worshipping pot pals in Guantanamo Bay as suspected terrorists in this hilarious sequel.

Comedy.title: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
Comedy.description: A Korean-American investment banker and his Indian-American roommate, a medical school candidate, get intoxicated and go looking for a White Castle fast-food restaurant in New Jersey.

Comedy.title: Hateship Loveship
Comedy.description: A wild teenage girl orchestrates a romance between her nanny and her father, who is a recovering addict. Stars Kristen Wiig and Guy Pearce.

Comedy.title: Hearts Beat Loud
Comedy.description: In Red Hook, Brooklyn, a father and daughter become an unlikely songwriting duo in the last summer before she leaves for college.

Comedy.title: Heathers
Comedy.description: Westerburg High School's elite clique of popular girls is "The Heathers," comprised of the powerful Heather Chandler, the green-with-envy Heather Duke, and the cowardly Heather McNamara. Rounding out the foursome is Veronica Sawyer (Winona Ryder), who is so fed up with the Heathers and the entire peer pressure cooker that she starts running with J.D. (Christian Slater), a mysterious - and possibly psychotic - motorcycle-riding newcomer. But what begins as their noble effort to rid Westerburg of its bad apples ends up taking a real toll. And their teen rebellion produces a serious and mounting body count. Shannen Doherty co-stars in this cruelly hilarious dark comedy, which became one of the biggest cult classics of the '80s.

Comedy.title: Hector and the Search for Happiness
Comedy.description: A psychiatrist searches the globe to find the secret of happiness.

Comedy.title: Hello I Must Be Going
Comedy.description: A divorcee (Melanie Lynskey) moves back in with her parents and begins a clandestine affair with a 19-year-old suitor (Christopher Abbott).

Comedy.title: Hey Arnold! The Jungle Movie
Comedy.description: Arnold and his class win a service trip to San Lorenzo. But when their trip takes a turn for the worst, their only hope of getting home may be retracing the dangerous path that led to Arnold's parents' disappearance.

Comedy.title: High-Rise
Comedy.description: Tom Hiddleston stars as Dr. Robert Laing, the newest resident of a luxurious apartment in a high-tech skyscraper whose lofty location places him amongst society's upper class. Laing quickly settles in and meets the other tenants: Charlotte (Sienna Miller), a bohemian single mother; Wilder (Luke Evans), a charismatic documentarian who lives with his pregnant wife Helen (Elisabeth Moss); and Mr. Royal (Jeremy Irons), the buildings enigmatic architect. Life seems like paradise to the solitude-seeking Laing. But, as power outages become more frequent and building flaws emerge, mainly on the lower floors, social strata begins to crumble and the building descends into a class war.

Comedy.title: His and Her Christmas
Comedy.description: A chance meeting between rival newspaper journalists with rival Christmas columns is an epic disaster--and maybe love at first sight.

Comedy.title: Holly's Holiday
Comedy.description: Holly Maddux longs for a man like the mannequin in a nearby store. After she slips and hits her head, she wakes to a perfect gentleman by her side. Holly hits it off with her new man but must choose between the perfect life and real love.

Comedy.title: Hooking Up
Comedy.description: A cynical writer and a hopeless romantic hit the road for a cross-country trip.

Comedy.title: Hot Guys with Guns
Comedy.description: Chinatown meets Boystown when an aspiring actor and a grizzled detective team up in this modern take on the old-fashioned detective story.

Comedy.title: Hot Rod
Comedy.description: Self-proclaimed stuntman Rod Kimble is preparing for the jump of his life - to clear fifteen buses to raise money for his abusive stepfather Frank's life-saving heart operation.

Comedy.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
Comedy.description: When the appearance of a Light Fury dragon coincides with the darkest threat they have faced, Hiccup and Toothless must journey to a hidden world and discover their destinies.

Comedy.title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
Comedy.description: Raised on hip-hop and foster care, defiant city kid Ricky gets a fresh start in the New Zealand countryside. He quickly finds himself at home with his new foster family: the loving Aunt Bella, the cantankerous Uncle Hec, and dog Tupac. When a tragedy strikes that threatens to ship Ricky to another home, both he and Hec go on the run in the bush. As a national manhunt ensues, the newly branded outlaws must face their options: go out in a blaze of glory or overcome their differences and survive as a family.  Equal parts road comedy and rousing adventure story, director Taika Waititi (WHAT WE DO IN THE SHADOWS, upcoming THOR: RAGNORAK) masterfully weaves lively humor with emotionally honest performances by Sam Neill and Julian Dennison....

Comedy.title: Hurricane Bianca
Comedy.description: A teacher from New York moves to a small town in Texas and is quickly fired for being gay. He soon returns dressed as a mean lady to get revenge on the nasty townspeople.

Comedy.title: The Hustle
Comedy.description: Rebel Wilson and Anne Hathaway have winning chemistry as a pair of con artists plying their trade in a stunning seaside town in the south of France as they compete to swindle a naive tech prodigy (Alex Sharp) out of his considerable fortune.

Comedy.title: I Feel Pretty
Comedy.description: A woman wakes up from a fall believing she is the prettiest woman on earth.

Comedy.title: I Love You Both
Comedy.description: A pair of co-dependent twins (Doug Archibald and Kristin Archibald) are charmed by the same guy (Lucas Neff) at a party. When they both start dating him, they must figure out which of them he likes better without upsetting their brother-sister bond.

Comedy.title: I, Tonya
Comedy.description: Based on the unbelievable but true events, I, Tonya is a dark comedic tale of American figure skater, Tonya Harding, and one of the most sensational scandals in sports history.

Comedy.title: In a Relationship
Comedy.description: Owen and Hallie have been together for years, but when Owen wavers on Hallie’s proposition to move in together, they make the rash decision to call it quits.

Comedy.title: Ingrid Goes West
Comedy.description: Ingrid (Plaza) is an unstable young woman who secretly moves to LA to befriend Taylor (Olsen) — a woman with a fabulous boyfriend, a cute terrier, and a ton of online followers. Ingrid's plan is threatened when Taylor’s brother arrives in town.

Comedy.title: Instant Family
Comedy.description: A couple who decides to start a family and adopt through the foster-care system, find themselves raising three wild kids who have no interest in being parented.

Comedy.title: The Interview
Comedy.description: Dave Skylark and producer Aaron Rapoport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight." When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un, they are recruited by the CIA.

Comedy.title: It Came from the Desert
Comedy.description: A pulpy monster movie inspired by the cult classic 1980s video game "It Came from the Desert," featuring rival motocross heroes and heroines, kegger parties in the desert, secret underground military bases...and of course giant ants!

Comedy.title: It's a Disaster
Comedy.description: After gathering for Sunday brunch at one of their homes, four couples realize they are stranded together as the world may be coming to an end during an apocalyptic crisis. Nevertheless, they continue to deal with their various relationship issues.

Comedy.title: Joshy
Comedy.description: Joshy and his friends turn a getaway into a weekend of debauchery in this wickedly amusing portrayal of male bonding and emotional incompetence.

Comedy.title: Juliet, Naked
