Family.description: "Missing Link" is a globe-trotting comedy-adventure about a dashing investigator of myths and monsters (Hugh Jackman) and the surprisingly silly and soulful beast he discovers (Zach Galifianakis).

Family.title: My Dad is Scrooge
Family.description: The animals of Woodsley Farm help Oliver and his little sister shock their Dad into embracing the holiday spirit while trying to save the farm.

Family.title: My Little Pony Crystal Princess: The Runaway Rainbow
Family.description: The Rainbow Celebration is almost near as everyone in Ponyville prepares and awaits the first rainbow of the season.

Family.title: My Little Pony: A Very Minty Christmas
Family.description: Clumsy Minty Pony (Tabitha St. Germain) breaks the holiday candy cane that guides Santa Claus to Ponyville every year; includes bonus episode "Dancing in the Clouds."

Family.title: My Little Pony: The Princess Promenade
Family.description: The ponies' annual Spring Promenade goes awry when a 1,000-year-old dragon awakens and fulfills a royal prophecy.

Family.title: My Little Pony: Twinkle Wish Adventure
Family.description: All the ponies cannot wait for the Winter Wishes festival where the Wishing Star grants each pony one special wish. But when the Wishing Star disappears, they go on a journey to find it. But will they make it back in time for the festival?

Family.title: My Santa
Family.description: Single mother Jen dislikes the holidays, but she starts to rediscover the magic of Christmas after meeting a handsome mall Santa, Chris. Jen is unaware that Chris is actually the son of the real Santa, on a mission to find his Mrs. Claus.

Family.title: Naughty & Nice
Family.description: When a cynical Los Angeles DJ is exiled to a quaint mountain town for the holiday season, the small-town charm and holiday cheer—not to mention his pretty new co-host—begin to melt his icy demeanor.

Family.title: Pan
Family.description: Hugh Jackman stars in this magical adaptation of 'Peter Pan' that finds Peter up against devious pirate Blackbeard.

Family.title: Passport to Paris
Family.description: Eager to see Paris but tired of their chaperon, identical twins (Ashley Olsen, Mary-Kate Olsen) tour France with two French teenagers.

Family.title: PawParazzi
Family.description: The cushy life of Latte the Hollywood dog is turned upside down when her owner, superstar actress London Bridges, heads to the boonies to make a new film.

Family.title: Pixi Saves Christmas
Family.description: For centuries, the many Christmas Genies of the world have worked together to bring magic and happiness to children. This year, however, former genie Monopolish is determined to become The One and Only Christmas Genie and launches a vicious attack on the secret Genies’ Forum. All hope for the survival of Christmas rests with Pixi Post, a lowly elf, who must use all her wits and skills to thwart his evil plan and save the most magical time of year.

Family.title: Pollitos En Fuga
Family.description: Mientras que las gallinas de la granja de la malévola Sra. Tweedy sueñan con una mejor vida, una astuta gallina llamada Ginger está empollando un plan para volar del nido, ¡para siempre!

Family.title: The Prince of Egypt
Family.description: An epic adventure of two brothers- one the ruler of a powerful empire and the other the chosen leader of his people. Their final confrontation will forever change the world.

Family.title: Racetime
Family.description: After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race.

Family.title: The Road to El Dorado
Family.description: When treasure hunters, Tulio (Kevin Kline) and Miguel (Kenneth Branagh) are mistaken for gods, they face a difficult decision: keep the riches or battle the odds to save El Dorado!

Family.title: Robo-Dog
Family.description: Tom Austin creates the most incredible canine the world has ever seen! But Tom's ex-boss Mr. Willis, finds out that Robo-Dog is powered by a technologically advanced super battery, and he plots to steal it for himself.

Family.title: Rodeo & Juliet
Family.description: A city girl is forced to go to the country where she meets a special horse and a young cowboy who teaaches her to barrel race while her mother reconnects with her former fiancé.

Family.title: Sabrina Down Under
Family.description: Sabrina aspires to learn about marine biology; when she discovers that the island's marine mammals are falling ill, including a handsome merman and his mermaid sister, she takes up an ecological cause on behalf of all of the inhabitants of the sea.

Family.title: The Secret of the Nutcracker
Family.description: In this innovative version of the world famous Christmas story, 12-year-old Clara takes a magical journey on Christmas Eve to find her father in a World War II Prisoner of War camp.

Family.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
Family.description: Sinbad the sailor must retrieve the stolen Book of Peace from a goddess with a penchant for chaos in this mythological animated tale.

Family.title: Snoopy Come Home
Family.description: This charming Peanuts feature centers around the world's most independent pooch. Snoopy leaves Charlie Brown to visit his former owner Lila in the hospital, then returns with her to her apartment house.

Family.title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
Family.description: After heroically defeating both the Snow Queen and the Snow King, Gerda, a selfless adventurer, is struggling with the disappearance of her parents. In order to find them, Gerda and her friends go on a dangerous mission.

Family.title: So This Is Christmas
Family.description: Eighteen-year-old Ashley's life is headed in the wrong direction. She's been hanging out with a bad crowd and seeking an escape from the drama at home.

Family.title: Spider-Man 3
Family.description: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

Family.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
Family.description: A wild horse yearns to be free after he is captured by a nasty U.S. colonel in this 2002 Oscar(R)-nominee for Best Animated Feature.

Family.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
Family.description: Marissa Cortez Wilson (Jessica Alba) is a retired spy who keeps that identity hidden from her clueless husband and whip-smart twin stepchildren, Rebecca (Rowan Blanchard) and Cecil (Mason Cook). However, when a villain called Timekeeper (Jeremy Piven) threatens to conquer the world, Marissa springs back into action as head of the OSS, home of the now-defunct Spy Kids Division. With help from some cool gadgets and two former spy kids, Rebecca and Cecil join the fight to save Earth.

Family.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Family.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Family.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Family.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Family.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
Family.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Family.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
Family.description: The crews of the Enterprise and the Excelsior must stop a plot to prevent a peace treaty between the Klingon Empire and the Federation.

Family.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
Family.description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of the federation plot against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Capt. Picard begins an open rebellion.

Family.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
Family.description: This first Star Trek film reunites the U.S.S. Enterprise's original crew. Capt. James T. Kirk now an admiral, and his crew must save humanity from an alien ship steadily approaching Earth and destroying everything in its path.

Family.title: Step Dogs
Family.description: Two very different dogs move into together when their owners get married. But when thieves try to break into their house, these four-legged foes must team up to defend their home.

Family.title: The Swan Princess
Family.description: From the director of The Fox and the Hound comes THE SWAN PRINCESS, a magical animated adventure (based on the classic fairytale SWAN LAKE) that has captured the hearts of audiences around the world!

Family.title: The Swan Princess and the Secret of the Castle
Family.description: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician.

Family.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
Family.description: Princess Odette, Prince Derek and their trusted woodland friends return for their first Christmas celebration!  But, with the villainous Rothbart striving to destroy Christmas itself, will they be able to stop him and save the day? Told in beautiful CG animation for the very first time, The Swan Princess Christmas is an enchanting musical holiday treat the whole family will enjoy!

Family.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
Family.description: Shortly after the Royal Family adopts a young girl named Alise, she is taken away into the forest. Princess Odette, Derek and their woodland friends, must work together to find a way to bring her home to the castle.

Family.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Myztery
Family.description: Your favorite characters are back in an all-new royal adventure! It seems that a mysterious "Z" is appearing as a mark on the palace residents. Who is behind the mark and what does it mean?

Family.title: The Swan Princess: Princess Tomorrow, Pirate Today
Family.description: With her parents away for the summer, fun-loving, young Princess Alise must spend her time with Queen Uberta, training to be the perfect, proper royal. But what she really wants is to become a swashbuckling pirate!

Family.title: The Swan Princess: The Mystery of the Enchanted Treasure
Family.description: The spirited animals of Swan Lake help their prince and princess save the kingdom from a sinister sorceress.

Family.title: Switching Goals
Family.description: Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen executive produce and star in the rousing comedy of two sisters who hatch the ultimate scheme to find out how their other half lives--by Switching Goals.

Family.title: Teen Spirit
Family.description: Violet (Elle Fanning) is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

Family.title: Terrific Trucks Save Christmas
Family.description: The team saves the town after a threat to the Christmas Tree Celebration.

Family.title: Treasure Hounds
Family.description: Moving into his late grandfather’s house, a clever tween inherits the old man’s dog, Skipper (Norm MacDonald) — who can talk! The sassy pooch leads the kid and his friends to a priceless treasure hidden nearby.

Family.title: Trolls World Tour
Family.description: When the kingdom is invaded by Rock Trolls, Queen Poppy (Anna Kendrick) and Branch (Justin Timberlake) embark on an epic quest to find the harmony that will save them all.

Family.title: UglyDolls
Family.description: An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.

Family.title: Urban Country
Family.description: Faith, a troubled 18-year-old city girl, moves to a horse ranch in the country to help her sick mother. While there, Faith learns to embrace the country lifestyle and the importance of family, hard work and helping others.

Family.title: A Very Brady Christmas
Family.description: Deck the halls with love and laughter as the Brady Bunch comes home for Christmas! Mike, Carol and the whole gang are back, in a warm and wonderful two hour special featuring all of the characters from the popular series - plus their new families.

Family.title: Wonder Park
Family.description: Wonder Park tells the story of a magnificent amusement park where the imagination of a wildly creative girl named June comes alive.

Family.title: Zapped
Family.description: Zoey discovers a smartphone app that magically controls boys.

History.title: The 12th Man
History.description: Nazis hunt for a lone surviving saboteur in this edge-of-your-seat WWII thriller based on a true-life story. Jonathan Rhys-Meyers stars.

History.title: 13 Assassins
History.description: Cult director Takashi Miike (Ichi the Killer, Audition) delivers a bravado period action film set at the end of Japan’s feudal era. 13 Assassins is centered around a group of elite samurai who are secretly enlisted to bring down a sadistic lord.

History.title: Air Strike
History.description: Starring Bruce Willis and Adrien Brody and featuring thrilling dogfight action, this intense epic portrays China's brave battle to stop the Japanese bomber strikes of WWII.

History.title: Australia
History.description: Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman star in this sweeping epic about an English woman who finds tragedy, danger and passion in Australia.

History.title: Best of Enemies
History.description: In 1968, ideological opposites William F. Buckley Jr. and Gore Vidal hold a series of riveting, nationally televised debates that usher in a new era of public discourse and pundit TV.

History.title: Bolden
History.description: BOLDEN imagines the compelling, powerful and tragic journey of Buddy Bolden, the unsung American hero who invented Jazz.

History.title: BPM (Beats Per Minute)
History.description: Nathan is a young man who joins an AIDS activist group in 1990s Paris. As he attends the weekly meetings, he learns that some members prefer a more radical approach to their protests.

History.title: The Catcher Was a Spy
History.description: Paul Rudd stars in this true-life thriller about a Boston Red Sox catcher-turned-WWII spy tasked with assassinating a Nazi atomic scientist. With Jeff Daniels, Paul Giamatti.

History.title: The Cokeville Miracle
History.description: Children who were held hostage in their elementary school tell stories of miraculous things, but many adults are skeptical that the Cokeville Miracle ever truly happened.

History.title: Experimenter
History.description: Yale University, 1961. Stanley Milgram (Peter Sarsgaard) designs a psychology experiment that remains relevant to this day, in which people think they’re delivering painful electric shocks to an affable stranger (Jim Gaffigan) strapped into a chair in another room. Disregarding his pleas for mercy, the majority of subjects do not stop the experiment, administering what they think are near-fatal electric shots, simply because they’ve been told to. Milgram’s exploration of authority and conformity strikes a nerve in popular culture and the scientific community. Celebrated in some circles, he is also accused of being a deceptive, manipulative monster. His wife Sasha (Winona Ryder) anchors him through it all.

History.title: The Girl King
History.description: Sweden’s Queen Kristina, a flamboyant and unpredictable woman who ascended the throne at age six, was raised as a prince and strived to bring peace and education to her country—all while pursuing an illicit romance with her female royal attendant.

History.title: Loving Vincent
History.description: Mystery surrounds the death of famed painter Vincent van Gogh in 1890 France.

History.title: Mary Shelley
History.description: During a stay at a lake house, the idea for 'Frankenstein' is born.

History.title: Nico, 1988
History.description: Nico, 1988 is the story of an artist, a mother, and the woman behind the icon. Approaching 50, Nico's life and career are on the ropes, a far cry from her glamorous days as a Warhol superstar and celebrated vocalist for The Velvet Underground.

History.title: Nina
History.description: Nina Simone (Zoe Saldana) was one of the century’s most extraordinary talents, but fame and fortune came with a price. Rediscovering the meaning of her life and work took courage, strength and one true friend: Clifton Henderson (David Oyelowo).

History.title: Operation Finale
History.description: This thrilling true story follows the 1960 covert mission of legendary Mossad agent Peter Malkin as he infiltrates Argentina and captures Adolf Eichmann.

History.title: The Pagan King
History.description: On his deathbed, the reigning king bestows power to an unexpected heir who must find strength within himself to unite his people against the violent crusades which threaten their freedom.

History.title: The Patriot
History.description: A reluctant South Carolina farmer (Mel Gibson) is forced to fight the British in this epic adventure of the American Revolution. Directed by Roland Emmerich (Independence Day). Screenplay by Robert Rodat (Saving Private Ryan).

History.title: Pawn Sacrifice
History.description: American chess legend Bobby Fischer (Tobey Maguire) and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) enthrall the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

History.title: Pilgrimage
History.description: Leaving his Irish monastery for the first time, a young novice departs with a devoted group of monks and a mysterious former Crusader as they attempt to transport a holy relic to Rome.

History.title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
History.description: In 18th century France a young painter, Marianne (Noémie Merlant), is commissioned to do the wedding portrait of Héloïse (Adèle Haenel). Day by day, the two women become closer as they share Héloïse's last moments of freedom before the impending wedding.

History.title: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
History.description: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his polyamorous relationship with his wife and his mistress who would inspire his creation of the superheroine, Wonder Woman.

History.title: Rebel in the Rye
History.description: A young J.D. Salinger struggles to find his voice in his life.

History.title: Sea of Shadows
History.description: Sea of Shadows uncovers a black market that threatens the extinction of the vaquita.

History.title: A Taxi Driver
History.description: In this powerful drama based on a true story, a down-on-his-luck taxi driver hired by a foreign journalist finds himself in a life-or-death struggle in the midst of the Gwangju Uprising.

History.title: The Three Musketeers
History.description: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

History.title: Tom of Finland
History.description: Finnish artist Touko Laaksonen becomes famous for his homoerotic works.

History.title: Walking With the Enemy
History.description: During World War II, a young Hungarian (Jonas Armstrong) disguises himself as a Nazi officer to save his family and thousands of his countrymen from the death camps. Meanwhile, Hungary's regent (Ben Kingsley) takes great risks to save his country.

History.title: Where Hands Touch
History.description: When the daughter of a white German mother and an African father meets a member of the Hitler Youth - compulsory for all Aryan boys in 1944 Germany, they must battle against the fates laid out before them during the most brutal of times.

Horror.description: Jack O'Connell is a British solider accidentally abandoned on the streets of Belfast in 1971. Alone, he must survive the night within enemy lines.

Horror.title: 2001 Maniacs
Horror.description: Travelers who take a wrong turn wind up becoming the main course for the hungry residents of a strange little town. Horror legend Robert Englund (Freddy from "A Nightmare on Elm Street") stars in this thrilling horror.

Dylan Branson (Michiel Huisman) begins to notice the repetition of ominous events that happen at the same time every day. As he’s drawn into a complex relationship with Sarah (Teresa Palmer), Dylan must and take control of time itself.

Horror.title: 52 Pick-Up
Horror.description: A wealthy industrialist's career and domestic life are threatened when he is caught in a compromising position with a young girl and is subsequently blackmailed.

Horror.title: Absolute Power
Horror.description: A jewel thief has to prove his innocence after being framed for a murder involving the U.S. president.

Horror.title: The Alchemist Cookbook
Horror.description: Young outcast Sean has isolated himself in a trailer in the woods with his cat Kaspar. When he turns from chemistry to black magic to crack nature’s secret, things go awry and he awakens something far more sinister and dangerous.

Horror.title: All That We Destroy
Horror.description: A geneticist, who fears that her son may be becoming a serial killer, creates a group of clones in an attempt to cure him of his psychopathic tendencies by allowing him to relive the murder of his first victim.

Horror.title: An American Haunting
Horror.description: In 1818, the family began to experience disturbances on their property. At first, slight, unexplained noises, but everything changed when the spirit began to grow, becoming aggressive and singling out the father, John.

Horror.title: Angel of Mine
Horror.description: In this intense thriller, Noomi Rapace stars as a woman on the edge who believes the daughter of a neighbor is actually her own.

Horror.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
Horror.description: A zombie apocalypse threatens the sleepy town of Little Haven - at Christmas – forcing Anna and her friends to fight, slash and sing their way to survival, facing the undead in a desperate race to reach their loved ones.

Horror.title: The Appearance
Horror.description: Mateho the Inquisitor (Jake Stormoen, "The Outpost") and his comrade (Kristian Nairn, “Game of Thrones”) are summoned to investigate a series of mysterious murders and the alleged ‘witch’ accused of the horrific crimes.

Horror.title: Arbitrage
Horror.description: Richard Gere leads an all-star cast in an electrifying thriller about a hedge-fund magnate whose fortunes turn when a deadly error threatens to destroy both his financial empire and his family.

Horror.title: Astral
Horror.description: A detached university student faces the consequences of astral projection when he uses it to reconnect with his dead mother.

Horror.title: Awaiting
Horror.description: Morris is a recluse with psychotic tendencies, whose life changes when his innocent daughter rescues one of his victims and befriends him.

Horror.title: The Axe Murders of Villisca
Horror.description: On a June night in 1912, eight people -- a mother, father, their four children, and two guests -- were murdered by an axe-wielding killer in the sleepy town of Villisca, Iowa, a case that remains unsolved to this day. More than a century later, Caleb and Denny, two friends who share an interest in ghost hunting, along with Jess -- the new girl in school who already has a reputation -- sneak into the house where the infamous bloodbath occurred in hopes of recording paranormal activity.

Horror.title: Backtrace
Horror.description: Twenty years after a botched robbery, three grifters kidnap an amnesia patient to jog his memory and find the long-lost money.

Horror.title: Before I Go to Sleep
Horror.description: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

Horror.title: Behind You
Horror.description: Two young sisters find that all the mirrors in her house are covered or hidden. When one of the sisters happens upon a mirror in the basement, she unknowingly releases a malicious demon that had haunted her mother and aunt years ago.

Horror.title: Beneath the Darkness
Horror.description: After watching their best friend get murdered, a group of teens struggle to expose a local hero as the vicious killer and keep from becoming his next victims.

Horror.title: Black Rock
Horror.description: Three childhood friends set aside their personal issues and reunite for a girls' weekend on a remote island off the coast of Maine. One wrong move turns their weekend getaway into a deadly fight for survival.

Horror.title: Blood Diner
Horror.description: Two brothers (Rick Burks, Carl Crew) running a diner collect body parts needed to bring an ancient goddess to life.

Horror.title: The Body
Horror.description: On Halloween, a hitman finds his work made more difficult when he has to transport a body, but everyone is enamored by what they think is his killer costume.

Horror.title: Body at Brighton Rock
Horror.description: An inexperienced park ranger discovers a body on a remote mountain trail and must guard it overnight until the police can arrive. Deep in the wilderness, all alone, she will face her darkest fears.

Horror.title: The Box
Horror.description: After stumbling upon an ancient box that carries a cryptic warning, a little boy makes a grave decision and must face the consequences.

Horror.title: A Breath Away
Horror.description: A deadly toxic mist has engulfed the city of Paris. Survivors escaped to the rooftops but Mathieu (Romain Duris) and Anna (Olga Kurylenko) must face the fog in order to save their daughter, who is trapped in a medical tank below.

Horror.title: Bug
Horror.description: In this Sci-Fi classic, an earthquake releases a strain of mutant cockroaches with the ability to start fires, and the destructive insects soon begin causing chaos in a small town.

Horror.title: Cabin Fever: Patient Zero
Horror.description: A group of friends planned the perfect vacation in the Caribbean, but their ultimate weekend devolves into their worst nightmare.

Horror.title: The Cabin in the Woods
Horror.description: In this twisted thriller, five friends arrive at a secluded cabin with clear instructions for their anticipated mountain getaway. But when the rigid rules are broken, punishment is swift and everyone will pay.

Horror.title: Cadaver
Horror.description: Strange events plague a group of medical students who practice dissection.

Horror.title: Call Me
Horror.description: Anna is the curious recipient of obscene phone calls that she assumes are from her boyfriend. When she arrives to meet the bizarre caller at a bar, Anna witnesses a brutal murder and becomes an unwilling player in a game of cat-and-mouse.

Horror.title: The Canal
Horror.description: A man who suspects his wife is cheating on him begins having nightmarish visions of an evil presence that he believes inhabits his house.

Horror.title: Captain Kronos: Vampire Hunter
Horror.description: A sword-wielding stranger stalks a new breed of vampire across the European countryside.

Horror.title: Carrion
Horror.description: A young woman who has telekinetic abilities shows up on her cousin's doorstep after 10 years in a mysterious Russian facility. As dark events from the past resurface, something in the woods begins hunting them.

Horror.title: Carved
Horror.description: A family obsessed with the jack-o-lantern Halloween tradition, carves off more than they expected with a pumpkin of unusual quality.

Horror.title: The Catcher Was a Spy
Horror.description: Paul Rudd stars in this true-life thriller about a Boston Red Sox catcher-turned-WWII spy tasked with assassinating a Nazi atomic scientist. With Jeff Daniels, Paul Giamatti.

Horror.title: Child's Play
Horror.description: A contemporary re-imagining of the 1988 horror classic, "Child's Play" follows Karen, a single mother who gifts her son Andy a Buddi doll, unaware of its more sinister nature.

Horror.title: Children of the Corn
Horror.description: A young couple (Linda Hamilton, Terminator 2, and Peter Horton, thirtysomething) find themselves stranded in the rural town of Gatlin, Neb., where they encounter a mysterious religious sect of children. But nowhere in town are there any adults. The horror grows to a blood-curdling climax as the two new visitors learn the horrifying secret behind the prospering corn fields. Based on the classic short story by Stephen King, CHILDREN OF THE CORN is a longtime horror favorite that has spawned six sequels and many imitations. See how it all started.

Horror.title: The Client
Horror.description: A lawyer protects a boy who stands amidst a firestorm involving mobsters and the law in this adaptation of John Grisham's novel.

Horror.title: The Clovehitch Killer
Horror.description: A picture-perfect family is shattered when the work of a serial killer hits too close to home. Dylan McDermott stars in this chilling portrait of all-American evil.

Horror.title: Coherence
Horror.description: In this mind-bending sci-fi thriller, 8 friends at a dinner party start experiencing strange and mysterious events on the night a comet is passing close to Earth. Soon it becomes clear that nothing and no one are what they appear.

Horror.title: The Cokeville Miracle
Horror.description: Children who were held hostage in their elementary school tell stories of miraculous things, but many adults are skeptical that the Cokeville Miracle ever truly happened.

Horror.title: The Cold Light of Day
Horror.description: Bruce Willis, Sigourney Weaver and Henry Cavill star in this pulse-pounding thriller about a man trying to save his kidnapped family.

Horror.title: The Colony
Horror.description: Years ago, winter came and left. Survivors have tried to build a new society underground, but they soon learn the real danger is not from the ice and cold, but from their fellow survivors.

Horror.title: Cosmos
Horror.description: Three amateur astronomers accidentally intercept what they believe to be a signal from a distant alien civilization, but the truth they uncover is more incredible than any of them dare to believe.

Horror.title: Crawl
Horror.description: A young woman, while attempting to save her father during a Category 5 hurricane, finds herself trapped in a flooding house and must fight for her life against alligators.

Horror.title: Crawlers
Horror.description: On Saint Patrick's day—a night of wild parties and drunken revelry—three unlikely friends band together to save a college town from a vicious horde of body-switching aliens.

Horror.title: Crypto
Horror.description: In this cyber-thriller starring Kurt Russell and Beau Knapp, a Wall Street banker connects a small-town art gallery to a global conspiracy, putting his own family in grave danger.

Horror.title: Culture Shock
Horror.description: This thriller follows a young Mexican woman in pursuit of the American Dream, who crosses illegally into the United States, only to find herself in an American nightmare.

Horror.title: The Cured
Horror.description: Humanity tries to reintegrate former zombies into society.

Horror.title: The Current Occupant
Horror.description: A man with no memory comes to believe that he's the president of the United States and the subject of a diabolical political conspiracy.

Horror.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
Horror.description: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status.

Horror.title: Damascus Cover
Horror.description: A man haunted by the death of his son must smuggle a chemical weapons scientist out of Syria. Within days his mission goes wrong. To survive, Ari reaches out to a deep cover agent and soon discovers that he is a pawn in a much bigger plan.

Horror.title: Dark Touch
Horror.description: In a remote Irish village, police are called to the scene of a massacre, but they ignore the lone survivor's claim that the house was responsible for the carnage.

Horror.title: Dark Was the Night
Horror.description: When a logging company decimates a forest in a small town, a sheriff (Kevin Durand) and his deputy (Lukas Haas) must confront the violent and unexplainable events that follow.

Horror.title: Daylight's End
Horror.description: A rogue drifter agrees to guide a band of survivors to sanctuary after a plague turns most of humanity into monsters.

Horror.title: Delivered
Horror.description: A pregnant woman’s life is upended when she realizes someone close to her has darker plans for her and the baby.

Horror.title: Depraved
Horror.description: Larry Fessenden returns with a modern twist on the Frankenstein myth, featuring a fanatical doctor as he reconstructs an unsuspecting man out of spare body parts.

Horror.title: The Devil's Candy
Horror.description: An artist and his family think they've moved into the house of their dreams, but when he is possessed by a mysterious dark force the family must fight to save their souls.

Horror.title: The Devil's Doorway
Horror.description: In 1960, two priests are sent to investigate a miracle in an Irish home for unwed mothers only to discover that one of the residents is possessed by the devil.

Horror.title: The Devil's Rejects Director's Cut
Horror.description: Rob Zombie's gritty, grisly sequel to "House of 1000 Corpses" finds the Firefly family continuing their murderous ways while on the run.

Horror.title: Digging Up the Marrow
Horror.description: A filmmaker (Adam Green) sets out on a bone-chilling odyssey after meeting a man (Ray Wise) who says that he can produce hard evidence that monsters are real.

Horror.title: The Dinner
Horror.description: Two estranged brothers and their wives meet at a restaurant to discuss a grotesque crime committed by their sons. With their involvement still a secret, they must decide how far they’ll go to protect the ones they love.

Horror.title: The Disappointments Room
Horror.description: A mother and her young son release unimaginable horrors from a hidden room in the attic of their rural dream home.

Horror.title: Dismissed
Horror.description: A discouraged high school teacher is thrilled by an honor student’s arrival until he realizes how far the vengeful scholar will go for a perfect GPA.

Horror.title: Distorted
Horror.description: An artist who suffers from bipolar disorder suspects the residents of her luxury apartment building are being subliminally brainwashed.

Horror.title: The Domestics
Horror.description: A survival love story! A young husband and wife must fight to return home in a post-apocalyptic mid-western landscape ravaged by gangs.

Horror.title: Don't Go
Horror.description: Between dreams and reality lies a terrifying hidden truth… A grieving father's nightmare holds the key to his daughter's death in this tantalizing psychological puzzle.

Horror.title: Down
Horror.description: A pair of coworkers gets trapped in an elevator over a long weekend, but what at first promises to be a romantic connection turns nefarious as each party begins to reveal who they truly are.

Horror.title: The Dunes
Horror.description: A young couple’s romantic beach date turns dark when they encounter a mysterious seaside stranger. Could the last day of summer be their last day ever?

Horror.title: The Dustwalker
Horror.description: Set in an isolated town in the middle of a harsh red desert, Sergeant Joanne Sharp fights to protect the town's people as they try to survive an insidious parasite brought to earth by an Alien spacecraft.

Horror.title: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
Horror.description: Cassandra Peterson stars in this sexy comedy hit, filled with wild wisecracks, campy chaos and scary movie spoofs.

Horror.title: Europa Report
Horror.description: An international 6 crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.

Horror.title: Evil Dead II
Horror.description: Sam Raimi's full-throttle sequel finds whacked-out dead basher Ash battling another batch of possessed pals at a remote cabin.

Horror.title: Exorcismus
Horror.description: Spanish horror film about a fifteen year old girl who falls prey to a series of seizures that leave doctors baffled, forcing her parents to summon a priest to deal with the sinister forces lurking within her.

Horror.title: The Eye
Horror.description: A blind violinist whose sight is restored begins having terrifying visions.

Horror.title: The Eye 2
Horror.description: The Pang Brothers explore the troubled and complicated relationship between the spirit world and the living.

Horror.title: Fast Color
Horror.description: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her family-and unearths the depths of the power within her.

Horror.title: Feral
Horror.description: Six friends fight to survive a cannibal-zombie plague on a camping trip gone terrifyingly wrong. With Halloween's Scout Taylor-Compton and The Walking Dead's Lew Temple.

Horror.title: The Field Guide to Evil
Horror.description: This global anthology of eight narratives explores dark folklore through a series of myths and tales that have captivated, galvanized and frightened communities throughout history.

Horror.title: Flagged
Horror.description: When a young woman takes a new position as a moderator for a major social media platform, she quickly realizes the job description may have left out some deadly details.

Horror.title: Flesh & Blood
Horror.description: On Thanksgiving, teenager Kimberly tries to move on from her mom’s unsolved murder to cure her agoraphobia. But under the care of her doting father, she starts to suspect that she is in danger and it’s always the ones you love who hurt you the most.

Horror.title: Frankenstein and the Monster from Hell
Horror.description: The infamous Frankenstein is again recreated, this time from the spare body organs of the criminally insane.

Horror.title: Friday The 13th, Part III
Horror.description: A group of teenagers heads up to a camp in the country and becomes the target of a psycho lurking about.

Horror.title: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
Horror.description: Having been revived at the hospital, Jason returns to Crystal Lake to meet more victims. However, this time has he met his match in Tommy Jarvis?

Horror.title: The Gallows Act II
Horror.description: While pursuing her dreams of stardom, a teenage actress is drawn into the dark world of a malevolent spirit in this supernatural thriller from Blumhouse, the producer of Paranormal Activity, Insidious and The Gallows.

Horror.title: Gemini
Horror.description: A heinous crime tests the complex relationship between a Hollywood starlet and her tenacious personal assistant. As the assistant unravels the mystery, she must confront her own understanding of friendship, truth and celebrity.

Horror.title: Getaway
Horror.description: A washed-up race car driver finds himself in a race against time to save his abducted wife in this heart-pounding thriller.

Horror.title: Ghost Stories
Horror.description: A man looking to debunk a series of paranormal events falls into a world of terror. Martin Freeman stars in a tale that will haunt your dreams.

Horror.title: Ghost Team (Unrated)
Horror.description: Determined to catch some ghosts on film, a paranormal-obsessed man mounts his own investigation into the beyond with his depressed best friend, misfit nephew, a cable access medium and an overeager security guard by his side.

Horror.title: The Ghoul
Horror.description: Chris is a homicide detective called to London to investigate a strange double murder. On a hunch, and with the help of an old colleague – and former girlfriend – Chris decides to go undercover as a patient to investigate the suspect’s psychotherapist.

Horror.title: The Gillymuck
Horror.description: A troop camping trip runs awry when a young girl encounters the cute and cuddly Gillymuck…and decides to bring the creature back to her campground.

Horror.title: Good Boy
Horror.description: When Maggie gets an emotional support dog to help quell some of her anxiety, she finds him to be even more effective than she imagined... because he kills anyone who adds stress to her life.

Horror.title: Goodnight Mommy
Horror.description: In this terrifying thriller, twin boys play a dangerous game of make-believe that blurs the line between nightmare and reality as they start to doubt whether their mother, recovering from cosmetic surgery, is really who she says she is.

Horror.title: Greener Grass
Horror.description: Suburbia has never been so hilariously absurd as it is in GREENER GRASS – where one eccentric housewife is driven mad by her eagerness to please. SNL's Beck Bennett co-stars.

Horror.title: The Guilty
Horror.description: When a 911 dispatcher and former cop answers an emergency call from a kidnapped woman, he has to find a way to save her using just his phone and his wits in this pulse pounding, award-winning crime thriller. Danish, subtitled in English.

Horror.title: Haunting, Horrifying Sounds from Beyond the Grave
Horror.description: A musician’s money-grab Halloween composition unleashes terror when he decides to exploit his mother’s dying moment.

Horror.title: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
Horror.description: A doctor seeks to unlock a puzzle box that opens a doorway to a hellish dimension controlled by Pinhead and his Cenobites in this sequel.

Horror.title: Hellraiser
Horror.description: From horror master Clive Barker comes this chilling nightmare featuring the first appearance of the hideous Pinhead.

Horror.title: Hidden Mother
Horror.description: A recently-widowed mother is gifted an antique photo that happens to harbor the presence of a sinister spirit within its frame.

Horror.title: High-Rise
Horror.description: Tom Hiddleston stars as Dr. Robert Laing, the newest resident of a luxurious apartment in a high-tech skyscraper whose lofty location places him amongst society's upper class. Laing quickly settles in and meets the other tenants: Charlotte (Sienna Miller), a bohemian single mother; Wilder (Luke Evans), a charismatic documentarian who lives with his pregnant wife Helen (Elisabeth Moss); and Mr. Royal (Jeremy Irons), the buildings enigmatic architect. Life seems like paradise to the solitude-seeking Laing. But, as power outages become more frequent and building flaws emerge, mainly on the lower floors, social strata begins to crumble and the building descends into a class war.

Horror.title: Higher Power
Horror.description: With his family’s life at stake, a true every-man acquires the power of a god and finds himself the unwilling test subject of a maniacal scientist bent on domination and revenge. From the Producer of Transformers.

Horror.title: The Host
Horror.description: A creature plunges from a bridge into the Han River, emerging on its shores for a feeding frenzy upon onlookers. When a young girl is snatched in the melee, her family sets off to recover her from the monster.

Horror.title: House of 1000 Corpses
Horror.description: Set in rural Texas in the 1970s, the group gets more than they bargained for when they find themselves stranded in an all-too-realistic house of horrors.

Horror.title: The House That Jack Built
Horror.description: Matt Dillon is a serial killer for whom murder is a work of art in the audacious, masterfully provocative new film from renegade visionary Lars von Trier.

Horror.title: The Housemaid
Horror.description: A forbidden passion awakens vengeful spirits within a haunted mansion in this bloodcurdling, erotic tour-de-force.

Horror.title: The Houses October Built
Horror.description: Looking to find an authentic, blood-curdling good fright for Halloween, five friends set off on a road trip in an RV to track down the ultimate haunted house.

Horror.title: The Houses October Built 2
Horror.description: Recovering from the trauma of being kidnapped last Halloween by the Blue Skeleton, five friends head back out to visit more haunted house attractions. But when signs of the Blue Skeleton start appearing again a new terror begins...

Horror.title: The Hug
Horror.description: A children’s party at a pizza arcade turns nightmarish when the birthday boy heads backstage to seek out an animatronic panda who is off duty.

Horror.title: I Am Alone
Horror.description: An unknown virus begins to spread infecting the local population almost instantly, but footage found by the CDC of one man's survival may just help them find a cure.

Horror.title: I Still See You
Horror.description: Several years after a cataclysmic event, Ronnie's suburban world has mostly returned to normal, except that the world is shared with ghosts, and one of them appears to be trying to kill her.

Horror.title: I Trapped the Devil
Horror.description: After trapping what he believes to be the devil, a man caught in a spiral of paranoia, trauma and evil unravels when his estranged family shows up for Christmas.

Horror.title: I'm Just F*cking With You
Horror.description: A young man and his sister endure a night of increasingly frightening practical jokes while spending the night at a secluded motel.

Horror.title: I.T
Horror.description: Mike Regan (Pierce Brosnan) is a successful, self-made man. But he soon finds himself in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when his I.T. consultant uses his skills to endanger Mike’s family, business and life.

Horror.title: In Extremis
Horror.description: Alex is a man with everything – a well-paid executive job, an impressive house in the country and a beautiful wife and child. When he inexplicably decides to leave work early one Friday, nothing will ever be the same again.

Horror.title: Inside
Horror.description: Young mother-to-be Sarah, recently widowed, is stalked by a stranger who is obsessed with her unborn child.

Horror.title: Into the Ashes
Horror.description: After losing his wife, Nick must decide if he will stay on his new path or exact revenge and force his enemies to pay for what they have done.

Horror.title: Intrigo: Dear Agnes
Horror.description: In this gripping thriller, a wealthy woman (Gemma Chan) wants to get rid of her cheating husband (Jamie Sives) and offers money to a widowed friend (Carla Juri)—desperately broke—to murder him.

Horror.title: Intrigo: Death of an Author
Horror.description: In this tense, riveting thriller starring Academy Award winner Ben Kingsley (GANDHI), an author plots the murder of his wife—but her body is never found, and he’s convinced that she’s still alive.

Horror.title: It Came from the Desert
Horror.description: A pulpy monster movie inspired by the cult classic 1980s video game "It Came from the Desert," featuring rival motocross heroes and heroines, kegger parties in the desert, secret underground military bases...and of course giant ants!

Horror.title: Jessabelle
Horror.description: Trauma sends a young woman back to her father's Louisiana home, where she is haunted by an evil presence.

Horror.title: Killer Grandma
Horror.description: Melissa, a happily married woman with an eight-year-old daughter invites her husband's mother to live with them.

Horror.title: A Kind of Murder
Horror.description: Patrick Wilson and Jessica Biel star in this Hitchcockian noir based on a novel by Patricia Highsmith (The Talented Mr. Ripley, Carol).

Horror.title: Knights of the Damned
Horror.description: On assignment by the King to slay the dragon besieging his kingdom, a group of knights encounters an unstoppable army of the dead.

Horror.title: Knives and Skin
Horror.description: A small-town collapses into disarray after a teenage girl goes missing and her friends and their families become ensnared in a web of lies, suspicion, and depravity.

Horror.title: The Last House on the Left (Unrated)
Horror.description: Two girls are tortured and left to die after they become captives of four prison escapees.  The merciless criminals end up in the house of one of the girls and the mother tortures and kills them.

Horror.title: The Last Man
Horror.description: In this apocalyptic thriller, Hayden Christensen plays a vet suffering from PTSD who takes the advice of a street prophet (Harvey Keitel) and starts preparing for the end of days.

Horror.title: Let the Right One In
Horror.description: Lonely, 12-year-old Oskar is regularly bullied by his stronger classmates.  A new friendship develops when Eli, a pale, serious young girl who only comes out at night, moves in next door.

Horror.title: Lippy
Horror.description: Two teenage friends caught shoplifting must face the wrath of an unforgiving security guard, who forces them into a strange underworld game.

Horror.title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
Horror.description: Rynn's father's dying wish is for his daughter to continue to have autonomy even after he's gone. To prepare her, he trains the teen to live independently and keep a low profile. When neighbors catch wind she's alone, not everyone has pure intentions.

Horror.title: Little Monsters
Horror.description: A film dedicated to all the kindergarten teachers who motivate children to learn, instill them with confidence and stop them from being devoured by zombies.

Horror.title: The Lodge
Horror.description: When the father is forced to abruptly depart for work, he leaves his children, Aidan and Mia in the care of his new girlfriend, Grace . Isolated and alone, a blizzard traps them inside the lodge as terrifying events summon specters from Grace’s dark past.

Horror.title: Lords of Chaos
Horror.description: A teenager's quest to launch Norwegian Black Metal in Oslo in the early 1990s results in a very violent outcome.

Horror.title: The Man Who Could Cheat Death
Horror.description: A man experimenting with immortality must have a gland operation every ten years to keep from reverting to his true age and dying a horrible death.

Horror.title: The Mandela Effect
Horror.description: A man becomes obsessed with facts and events that have been collectively misremembered by thousands of people. Believing the phenomena to be the symptom of something larger, his obsession eventually leads him to question reality itself.

Horror.title: Marrowbone
Horror.description: A young man and his younger siblings who have concealed the death of their mother to remain together are plagued by a sinister presence in their home.

Horror.title: Mary
Horror.description: Soon after David impulsively buys an abandoned boat for his family business, a mysterious presence begins to terrorize him and his family.

Horror.title: Matriarch
Horror.description: An expecting Mother and husband crash their car in the countryside and are offered shelter by a farmer and his wife.

Horror.title: Maze
Horror.description: Based on the incredible true story of the 1983 mass break-out of 38 IRA prisoners from the HMP Maze high security prison, one prisoner engineers the largest European prison escape since World War II.

Horror.title: Midnight Kiss
Horror.description: A group of gay best friends and their gal pal head to a desert home to celebrate New Year’s Eve. But when a sadistic killer wants in on the party, relationships are tested and secrets are exposed as the night turns into a fight for survival.

Horror.title: The Midnight Man
Horror.description: It was supposed to be just an urban legend… Two teens unleash a demonic force who pits them against their greatest fears and dares them to survive his unholy game. Starring Robert Englund.

Horror.title: Midnighters
Horror.description: A New Years night becomes a long day's journey into dread for one unlucky couple in the nerve-twisting feature debut from The Walking Dead and Krypton director Julius Ramsay.

Horror.title: Mom and Dad
Horror.description: A teenage girl and her little brother try to survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origins causes parents to turn violently on their own children.

Horror.title: Mother
Horror.description: A woman embarks on an obsessive quest to clear her son's name of murder.

Horror.title: My Bloody Valentine
Horror.description: A crazed miner returns from deep within the bowels of a dark tunnel with a pick in his hand and revenge in his heart.

Horror.title: My Friend Dahmer
Horror.description: Disney’s Ross Lynch stars as the awkward, adolescent Jeffrey Dahmer – before he became one of America’s most infamous serial killers. Based on the acclaimed graphic novel, this is the haunting, sad, funny, true story of Dahmer in high school.

Horror.title: My Killer Client
Horror.description: Christa Bright is an aspiring personal stylist who has an instant connection with new client Kat Niven, a shy woman who needs help gaining confidence.

Horror.title: My Valentine
Horror.description: A pop singer’s artistic identity is stolen by her ex-boyfriend/manager and shamelessly pasted onto his new girlfriend/protégé. Locked together late one night in a concert venue, the three reconcile emotional abuses of the past…until things turn violent.

Horror.title: A Nasty Piece of Work
Horror.description: A mid-level corporate employee finds out he’s not getting the Christmas bonus he was expecting, but his boss invites him to earn a promotion by beating his professional rival in a violent competition.

Horror.title: New Year, New You
Horror.description: A group of old friends gather for a girls’ night on New Years Eve. But as they begin to rehash old memories, many of the gripes they’ve been harboring manifest in murderous ways.

Horror.title: The Nightingale
Horror.description: Director Jennifer Kent ("The Babadook") tells the sweeping tale of a young woman's quest for revenge set in 1825 against the perilous and unforgiving terrain of Tasmania.

Horror.title: The Ninth Gate
Horror.description: Rare book dealer Johnny Depp goes in search of the one legitimate copy of a volume believed to have been written by Satan himself.

Horror.title: The Oath
Horror.description: A controversial White House policy turns family member against family member in a savagely funny dark comedy about surviving life and Thanksgiving in the age of political tribalism.

Horror.title: Oculus
Horror.description: A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.

Horror.title: Odd Thomas
Horror.description: Small-town fry cook Odd Thomas (Anton Yelchin) is an ordinary guy with a paranormal secret: he sees dead people, everywhere.

Horror.title: The Omen
Horror.description: When the U.S. Ambassador to England begins to suspect that his son is the Anti-Christ, he must wrestle with the decision to kill the child.

Horror.title: Operation Finale
Horror.description: This thrilling true story follows the 1960 covert mission of legendary Mossad agent Peter Malkin as he infiltrates Argentina and captures Adolf Eichmann.

Horror.title: The Osiris Child
Horror.description: When a dangerous outbreak threatens to destroy everyone living on a newly colonized planet, Lt. Kane Sommerville goes against orders and leaves his station to rescue his young daughter before it's too late.

Horror.title: The Other Lamb
Horror.description: A young woman born into an all-female cult beings to question the teachings of her leader.

Horror.title: Out of Blue
Horror.description: Patricia Clarkson is a New Orleans detective whose hunt for a killer draws her into a mystery of cosmic proportions in this tantalizing noir thriller.

Horror.title: Outbreak
Horror.description: Doctors try to stop a deadly virus spreading through a California town.

Horror.title: Overlord
Horror.description: D-Day invasion finds two paratroopers caught behind enemy lines fighting Nazis and supernatural forces, resulting from a secret Nazi experiment.

Horror.title: Painkillers
Horror.description: After a terrible car crash in which his son dies, brilliant surgeon John Clarke, tormented by guilt, becomes prey to an unbearable physical pain.

Horror.title: Paranormal Activity 3
Horror.description: In 1988, young sisters Katie and Kristi befriend an invisible entity who resides in their home.

Horror.title: Parasite
Horror.description: Greed, class discrimination, and a mysterious interloper threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

Horror.title: Pathology
Horror.description: Medical students compete to see who can commit the perfect murder.

Horror.title: A Perfect Murder
Horror.description: A wealthy woman becomes the target for murder when her husband, an investor with financial difficulties, discovers her affair with an artist and blackmails her lover into killing her.

Horror.title: Pet Sematary
Horror.description: Pet Sematary follows Dr. Louis Creed, who, after relocating with his wife Rachel and their two young children from Boston to rural Maine, discovers a mysterious burial ground hidden deep in the woods near the family's new home.

Horror.title: Phase IV
Horror.description: Ecological suspense tale about a strange biological imbalance creating super intelligent ants which attack a scientific installation in the Arizona desert.

Horror.title: Phoenix Forgotten
Horror.description: 20 years after three teenagers disappeared in the wake of mysterious lights appearing above Phoenix, Arizona, unseen footage from that night has been discovered, chronicling the final hours of their fateful expedition.

Horror.title: Pilgrim
Horror.description: A woman invites Pilgrim re-enactors to stay with her family over Thanksgiving, but things turn deadly when the "actors" refuse to break character.

Horror.title: Pledge
Horror.description: Three friends pledge a fraternity that's deadly serious about its secret rituals, turning their rush into a race for survival.

Horror.title: Pooka Lives!
Horror.description: A group of thirty-something friends from high school create their own Creepypasta about Pooka for laughs, but are shocked when it becomes so viral on the Internet that it actually manifests more murderous versions of the creature.

Horror.title: Pooka!
Horror.description: Christmas is coming up, so a struggling actor gets a holiday season job as a character in a plush suit to promote the hottest toy of the year, “Pooka.” At first it’s a fun and friendly distraction, but he slowly develops two personalities-one when he’s in the suit, and one that’s outside it-as Pooka slowly starts to take possession of him. This unconventional monster movie is directed by Academy Award nominated filmmaker Nacho Vigalondo, the visionary behind the acclaimed 2016 Kaiju film COLOSSAL.

Horror.title: The Postcard Killings
Horror.description: In The Postcard Killings, based on the James Patterson and Liza Marklund #1 New York Times bestselling novel, NY Detective Jacob Kanon’s (Jeffery Dean Morgan) world is destroyed when his daughter and son-in-law are brutally murdered in London.

Horror.title: The Prodigy
Horror.description: A young mother (Taylor Schilling) is concerned about her 8-year-old son's disturbing behavior and thinks that something supernatural may be at work. Jackson Robert Scott ("It"), Peter Mooney ("Burden of Truth") and Colm Feore "Thor") also star.

Horror.title: Prospect
Horror.description: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote moon on the hunt for elusive riches. But there are others roving the moon's toxic forest and the job quickly devolves into a desperate fight to escape.

Horror.title: Psycho Granny
Horror.description: After Samantha loses her mother, her grief-stricken spirits are lifted with the sudden appearance of Colleen. Colleen is Samantha's long-lost grandmother who swoops in to ease her pain and guide her through the ups and downs of her pregnancy.

Horror.title: Pure
Horror.description: Several teen girls perform a secret ritual at a Purity Retreat and, when one of them begins to see a supernatural entity, the terrifying question becomes what is more dangerous; the demon they’ve unleashed, or the pressure of their controlling fathers.

Horror.title: Pyewacket
Horror.description: When you're dealing with demons, be careful what you wish for... A teenager's death curse plunges her into an unholy occult nightmare. From the director of Backcountry.

Horror.title: The Quake
Horror.description: From the people that brought you the hit thriller The Wave, this action spectacular forewarns a new catastrophic disaster when the city of Oslo is threatened by a devastating earthquake. Norwegian with English subtitles.

Horror.title: Quantum of Solace
Horror.description: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.

Horror.title: A Quiet Place
Horror.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

Horror.title: Rare Exports: A Christmas Tale
Horror.description: In this darkly comic gem, it's Christmas Eve in northern Finland, and an archeological dig has just unearthed Santa Claus. But this Santa isn't one you want coming to town.

Horror.title: The Remains
Horror.description: When a family moves into an old Victorian home, they discover a chest in the attic containing antiques inhabited by an evil spirit. As the antiques slowly possess each family member, the spirit grows stronger.

Horror.title: The Resident
Horror.description: Juliet, has found the perfect New York apartment to start a new life after separating from her husband. It's got spacious rooms, and a handsome landlord. But there are secrets behind every wall as Juliet gets the feeling that she is not alone.

Horror.title: The Reunion
Horror.description: After the death of her father, a daughter fulfills his last wish and finds a way to bring her three brothers back together.

Horror.title: Ride
Horror.description: Spin classes can be a bit intimidating. But for Brit, the fear is real when her first class turns into a ride for her life.

Horror.title: The Ripper
Horror.description: When the rhythm guitarist of a band is pushed to attempt a solo, he instead starts to reveal some haunting hidden talents.

Horror.title: The Rizzle
Horror.description: A young woman is drawn into a video on the internet of an old, ritualistic dance, and unwittingly unlocks a supernatural dillemma.

Horror.title: Room of Death
Horror.description: In this creepy murder mystery, victims of a serial killer are being mangled to look like dolls; a rookie female detective tries desperately to stop the killing.

Horror.title: The Row
Horror.description: While her cop father (Randy Couture) tries to stop the serial killer preying on her sorority sisters, new pledge Riley (Lala Kent) must not only endure cruel hazing rituals, but try to survive the demented killer.

Horror.title: Running with the Devil
Horror.description: When a cocaine shipment is compromised, a drug cartel’s CEO, known as The Boss orders his most trusted henchman, The Cook, and his partner, another master drug trafficker known as The Man, on a dangerous journey to audit the company’s supply chain.

Horror.title: Safe
Horror.description: Mei, a young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued by the Triads, the Russian mob, and corrupt NYC cops. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

Horror.title: Scenic Route
Horror.description: Stranded on an isolated desert road, two life-long friends fight for survival as their already strained relationship spirals into knife-wielding madness.

Horror.title: The School
Horror.description: When a doctor looking for her missing child awakens to find herself in an abandoned school, she must survive the supernatural terror and face her own demons if she is to find the truth about where her son is.

Horror.title: School Spirit
Horror.description: A group of social outcasts stuck in weekend detention is confronted by the school's legendary hauntings.

Horror.title: A Score to Settle
Horror.description: With only a short time to live, Frankie Carver is released from prison, vowing to track down every last member of the gang that betrayed him.

Horror.title: Sea Fever
Horror.description: Solitary marine-biology student Siobhán endures a week on a ragged fishing trawler, miserably at odds with the close-knit crew. But out in the deep Atlantic, an unfathomable life-form soon ensnares the boat. As members of the crew now succumb to a strange infection, Siobhán must overcome her alienation and win their trust -- before everyone is lost.

Horror.title: The Sender
Horror.description: A telepathic, suicidal man, unable to control his powers, transfers his nightmares to his psychiatrist and causes havoc in a hospital.

Horror.title: Shirley
Horror.description: Upon moving to a small Vermont college town, Fred and Rose get an offer for free room and board from a professor, as long as Rose agrees to look after his wife, acclaimed horror author Shirley Jackson.

Horror.title: The Shrine
Horror.description: The search for a missing teen in Poland leads a rookie reporter (Cindy Sampson) and her companions to an encounter with deadly cultists.

Horror.title: A Simple Favor
Horror.description: "A Simple Favor," directed by Paul Feig, centers around Stephanie (Anna Kendrick), a mommy vlogger who seeks to uncover the truth behind her best friend Emily's (Blake Lively) disappearance.

Horror.title: Sleeping with the Enemy
Horror.description: In this tense thriller, a battered wife (Julia Roberts) stages her death, moves, and assumes a new identity – only to be threatened again once her husband learns of the ruse.

Horror.title: Slumber
Horror.description: A sleep doctor (Maggie Q) tries to protect a family from a parasitic demon that feeds on people in their nightmares. In order to defeat the dark spirit , she must journey into her own nightmares and confront her childhood demons.

Horror.title: Southbound
Horror.description: On a desolate stretch of desert highway, weary travelers—two men on the run from their past, a band on their way to the next gig, a man struggling to get home, a brother in search of his long-lost sister and a family on vacation—are forced to confront their worst fears and darkest secrets in these interwoven tales of terror and remorse on the open road...

Horror.title: Spiderhole
Horror.description: A young artist (Emma Griffiths Malin) and her friends find terror lurking in the shadows of an abandoned London home when they move in as squatters.

Horror.title: Spinning Man
Horror.description: When a 17-year old girl goes missing, family man and distinguished college professor, Evan Birch’s (Guy Pearce) life is turned upside down as circumstantial evidence convinces gruff police Detective Malloy (Pierce Brosnan) that Birch is a prime suspect. As Malloy begins to peel back the layers of Birch’s past indiscretions with female students, and his wife (Minnie Driver) begins to question his alibi, Birch’s life starts to unravel, and suddenly the questions that he’s faced with aren’t merely academic – they’re a matter of life and death.

Horror.title: The Standoff at Sparrow Creek
Horror.description: An ex-cop realizes that the shooter at a police funeral is one of his fellow militiamen and must use extreme measures to prevent further bloodshed.

Horror.title: Starfish
Horror.description: With reality fraying at the edges, Aubrey (Virginia Gardner) finds herself following a string of mixtapes left by her dead friend. The clues unravel the secrets of a mysterious Signal; one that could either save the world... or condemn it.

Horror.title: Stir of Echoes
Horror.description: A man (Kevin Bacon) beings having disturbing visions that lead him on an obsessive search for answers in this scary ghost story.

Horror.title: The Strange Ones
Horror.description: Mysterious events surround two travelers, presumably brothers, as they make their way across a remote American landscape. On the surface all seems normal, but what appears to be a simple vacation soon gives way to a dark and complex web of secrets.

Horror.title: Swiped to Death
Horror.description: Dating can be hell. When Olivia “swipes right” on a handsome stranger, her world collides with some serious hidden danger.

Horror.title: The Tall Man
Horror.description: Starring Jessica Biel. In an isolated town, children are vanishing without a trace and the locals believe a mysterious entity known as "The Tall Man" is responsible. Town nurse Julia is a skeptic, until her own child disappears.

Horror.title: Tank 432
Horror.description: In this claustrophobic thriller, an abandoned tank becomes a metal tomb for a group of soldiers hunted by an alien horror bent on annihilation.

Horror.title: The Tenant
Horror.description: A lonely young man rents a flat that was formerly occupied by a girl who committed suicide. Gradually he begins to assume her identity, dressing in her clothes, and eventually throwing himself out of the same window from which she jumped to her death.

Horror.title: Texas Chainsaw
Horror.description: A young woman learns that she has inherited a Texas estate from a grandmother she never knew she had. But her newfound wealth comes at a price as she stumbles upon a horror that awaits her in the mansion's dank cellars.

Horror.title: They Come Knocking
Horror.description: After losing his wife to cancer, a father takes his two daughters on a road trip where he finds his family in the crosshairs of terrifying supernatural entities.

Horror.title: The Tracker
Horror.description: A mysterious stranger travels to a remote village where, 15 years earlier, his wife and daughter were kidnapped.

Horror.title: Tragedy Girls
Horror.description: Best friends Sadie and McKayla are on a mission to boost their social media fandom as amateur crime reporters hot on the trail of a deranged local serial killer. After they manage to capture the killer and secretly hold him hostage, they realize the best way to up get scoops on future victims would be to, you know, murder people themselves. As the @TragedyGirls become an overnight sensation and panic grips their small town, can their friendship survive the strain of national stardom? Will they get caught? Will their accounts get verified?

Horror.title: Trapped Model
Horror.description: Inspired by true events. Grace, an aspiring model, is thrilled to have fashion photographer Hunter Kelly help launch her career.

Horror.title: Treehouse
Horror.description: Celebu-chef Peter Rake escapes a scandal for a weekend at his family’s isolated vacation home, but there are debts to repay and Peter has to learn the lesson that a woman’s place is anywhere that she chooses to be… if he survives.

Horror.title: Trespassers
Horror.description: Two couples rent a gorgeous house in the desert for a sex- and drug-fueled escape from reality—a doomed vacation that quickly escalates into a bloody fight to survive.

Horror.title: Trick
Horror.description: Every Halloween since “Trick” massacred his classmates at a party, a masked killer reappears to kill innocent people in increasingly terrifying ways.

Horror.title: Uncanny Annie
Horror.description: On Halloween night a group of college students get trapped in a mysterious board game that brings their darkest secrets and fears to life, where they must play to escape…and win to survive.

Horror.title: Undertow
Horror.description: Set in a contemporary South untouched by time, The Undertow is a dramatic thriller about two brothers who run away from home to guard a secret following the death of their father and the arrival of their greedy, troubled uncle.

Horror.title: Undo
Horror.description: A physicist celebrates a breakthrough in reversing the flow of time...until a haunting figure pays him a visit.

Horror.title: Unlocked
Horror.description: A CIA interrogator tries to prevent an imminent terrorist attack.

Horror.title: Urn
Horror.description: A woman who angrily scatters her mother’s ashes into a lake, finds it’s not so easy to throw away the past.

Horror.title: The Wave
Horror.description: Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.

Horror.title: We Are What We Are
Horror.description: In this riveting horror-thriller, a family of cannibals takes extreme measures to find their next meal.

Horror.title: We Die Young
Horror.description: Lucas, a 14-year-old boy inducted into the gang life in Washington D.C., is determined that his 10-year-old brother won't follow the same path. When an Afghanistan war veteran comes into the neighborhood, an opportunity arises.

Horror.title: Welcome to Mercy
Horror.description: A young woman must fight against the unholy forces that possess her in this terrifying occult thriller.

Horror.title: WolfCop
Horror.description: One evening during the late shift, Lou investigates a mysterious disturbance at the edge of town and wakes up with a pentagram carved in his chest, heightened senses and body hair that’s growing at an alarming rate.

Horror.title: The Woods
Horror.description: A tormented teen (Agnes Bruckner) has terrifying visions, while her classmates at a remote boarding-school for girls go missing.

Horror.title: Wounds
Horror.description: Disturbing and mysterious things begin happening to a New Orleans bartender (Armie Hammer) after he picks up a phone left behind in his bar. Also starring Dakota Johnson and Zazie Beetz.

Horror.title: The Wretched
Horror.description: A rebellious teenage boy embarks on a gutsy crusade to stop the terrifying evil he suspects has possessed his neighbor in this bone-chilling occult thriller.

Horror.title: XX
Horror.description: Four dark horror stories by women: Annie Clark with THE BIRTHDAY PARTY; Karyn Kusama exorcises HER ONLY LIVING SON; Roxanne Benjamin screams DON’T FALL; and Jovanka Vuckovic dares to open THE BOX. Award-winning Sofia Carrillo wraps it all together.

International.description: Jack O'Connell is a British solider accidentally abandoned on the streets of Belfast in 1971. Alone, he must survive the night within enemy lines.

International.title: (Dub) Akira
International.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

International.title: (Dub) Grave of the Fireflies
International.description: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, they struggle to survive in this heartbreaking story detailing the true casualties of war.

International.title: (Sub) Akira
International.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

International.title: (Sub) Grave of the Fireflies
International.description: In the final months of World War II, 14-year-old Seita and his sister Setsuko are orphaned. With no surviving relatives and their emergency rations depleted, they struggle to survive in this heartbreaking story detailing the true casualties of war.

International.title: (Sub) Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky
International.description: Ten years ago, an invasion by the Erebonians almost shattered the Kingdom of Liberl. For Estelle Bright it’s all ancient history. But history repeats; as Estelle and her brother find themselves in the wrong place when mayhem breaks out.

International.title: (Sub) Trigun: Badlands Rumble
International.description: Twenty years ago, Vash the Stampede allowed an infamous outlaw named Gasback to escape final justice. Now, on the streets of Macca City, Vash is about to learn a hard truth about consequences - and he might end up paying for the lesson with his life.

International.title: The 12th Man
International.description: Nazis hunt for a lone surviving saboteur in this edge-of-your-seat WWII thriller based on a true-life story. Jonathan Rhys-Meyers stars.

International.title: 13 Assassins
International.description: Cult director Takashi Miike (Ichi the Killer, Audition) delivers a bravado period action film set at the end of Japan’s feudal era. 13 Assassins is centered around a group of elite samurai who are secretly enlisted to bring down a sadistic lord.

International.title: 4 Lovers
International.description: In this sexy, French romantic drama, two couples decide to explore the boundaries of their relationships by swapping partners.

International.title: All the Wild Horses
International.description: All the Wild Horses follows endurance horse riders from the United States, Canada, South Africa, Ireland, the United Kingdom and the Netherlands as they compete in the wild and therefore untamed Mongol Derby horse race in Mongolia.

International.title: Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds
International.description: In this action-packed fantasy epic, a firefighter is taken to the afterlife by three guardians, where only after passing seven trials and proving he lived a noble life will he be able to reincarnate.

International.title: Barking Dogs Never Bite
International.description: In Bong Joon-ho’s directorial debut, a couple is driven to distraction by a yapping dog located in their apartment complex. Determined to relieve their annoyance, they take extreme action against his tormentor.

International.title: Blade of the Immortal
International.description: Manji, a highly skilled samurai, becomes cursed with immortality after a legendary battle. Haunted by the brutal murder of his sister, Manji knows that only fighting evil will regain his soul. The 100th film by master director Takashi Miike.

International.title: Border
International.description: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.

International.title: Borg vs McEnroe
International.description: It's the summer of 1980, and Björn Borg is the top tennis player in the world, dominating the sport both on and off the court. A powerful and rigorously disciplined player, there is only one obstacle in his pursuit of a record-breaking fifth Wimbledon championship: the highly talented but ferociously abrasive young American John McEnroe. With three days until the tournament begins, Borg trains religiously in his lavish Monaco home, aided by his coach and mentor Lennart and girlfriend Mariana.

International.title: Cashback
International.description: Ben develops insomnia after a painful breakup. To kill time, he takes a night shift at the local supermarket. Dealing with the boredom of an eight-hour shift, Ben imagines freezing time, which allows him to see the beauty of the everyday world.

International.title: The Commune
International.description: From Oscar-nominated director Thomas Vinterberg (The Celebration, The Hunt), comes a funny and moving story of family and free love set in a freewheeling 1970s commune. Danish with English subtitles.
